pokedex_entries.ruby: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: ABSOL has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters. It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This POKéMON very rarely ventures down from the mountains.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It sharply senses even subtle changes in the sky and the land to predict natural disasters. It is a long-lived POKéMON that has a life-span of 100 years.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It has the ability to foretell natural disasters. Its life span is over a hundred years.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It appears from deep in the mountains to warn people about upcoming disasters it has sensed with its horn.
pokedex_entries.x: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
pokedex_entries.y: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Every time Absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Absol has the ability to foretell the coming of natural disasters. It lives in a harsh, rugged mountain environment. This Pokémon very rarely ventures down from the mountains.
pokedex_entries.sun: Long ago, superstitions were spread about it, saying it brought disaster. This fed a hatred of it, and it was driven deep into the mountains.
pokedex_entries.moon: Although it’s said to bring disaster, in actuality, this Pokémon possesses a calm disposition and warns people of any crises that loom.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The only thing unlucky about Absol is its appearance. It protects fields and warns people of disaster, so one ought to be grateful for it.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: The elderly call it the disaster Pokémon and detest it, but interest in its power to predict disasters is on the rise.
pokedex_entries.sword: Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.
pokedex_entries.shield: Because of this Pokémon’s ability to detect danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer of doom.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.

pokedex_entries.ruby: AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: AGGRON is surprisingly protective of its environment. If its mountain is ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this POKéMON will haul topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its own territory.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It claims a large mountain as its sole territory. It mercilessly thrashes those that violate its space.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its iron horns grow longer a little at a time. They are used to determine the AGGRON’s age. The gouges in its armor are worn with pride as mementos from battles.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: You can tell its age by the length of its iron horns. It claims an entire mountain as its territory.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don’t take it lightly.
pokedex_entries.x: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don’t take it lightly.
pokedex_entries.y: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This Pokémon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Aggron is protective of its environment. If its mountain is ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this Pokémon will haul topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its own territory.
pokedex_entries.sword: Aggron has a horn sharp enough to perforate thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by ramming into them horn first.
pokedex_entries.shield: Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He was trying to channel the Pokémon’s strength.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.

pokedex_entries.ruby: ALTARIA dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: ALTARIA sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This POKéMON catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: If you hear a beautiful melody trilling deep among mountains far from people, it is ALTARIA’s humming.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It hums in a beautiful soprano voice. It flies among white clouds in the blue sky. It launches intensely hot fireballs from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.
pokedex_entries.platinum: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you’re in a dream.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
pokedex_entries.x: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you’re in a dream.
pokedex_entries.y: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.
pokedex_entries.sword: As it flies in a calm and relaxed manner, Altaria performs a humming song that would enrapture any audience.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon has a kind disposition, but if it’s provoked, it will threaten opponents with shrill cries before attacking them without mercy.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
pokedex_entries.violet: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.

pokedex_entries.ruby: ANORITH was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: ANORITH is said to be a type of POKéMON predecessor, with eight wings at the sides of its body. This POKéMON swam in the primordial sea by undulating these eight wings.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is a kind of POKéMON progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It was resurrected from a fossil using the power of science. It swims by undulating the eight wings at its sides. They were feet that adapted to life in the sea.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: An ancestral Pokémon that lived in the ocean. Over time, its eight feet transformed into wings.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
pokedex_entries.x: It is a kind of Pokémon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
pokedex_entries.y: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Anorith was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive Pokémon once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Anorith is said to be a type of Pokémon predecessor, with eight wings at the sides of its body. This Pokémon swam in the primordial sea by undulating these eight wings.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: When restored Anorith are released into the ocean, they don’t thrive, because the water composition has changed since their era.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: This is one kind of primeval bug Pokémon. With eight wings, it could apparently swim a lot faster than you’d expect.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Anorith lived in the ocean about 100,000,000 years ago, hunting with its pair of claws.
pokedex_entries.shield: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: This Pokémon ancestor was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with its claws.

pokedex_entries.ruby: ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This POKéMON’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: ARMALDO is a POKéMON species that became extinct in prehistoric times. This POKéMON is said to have walked on its hind legs, which would have been more convenient for life on land.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.
pokedex_entries.emerald: ARMALDO usually lives on land. However, when it hunts for prey, it dives beneath the ocean. It swims around using its two large wings.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.
pokedex_entries.x: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
pokedex_entries.y: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Armaldo’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This Pokémon’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Armaldo is a Pokémon species that became extinct in prehistoric times. This Pokémon is said to have walked on its hind legs, which would have been more convenient for life on land.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It lived on land and went out into the sea to hunt for prey. Its sharp claws were its greatest weapon.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Armaldo adapted from living in water to living on land. It has been determined that it is the ancestor of some bug Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.sword: After evolution, this Pokémon emerged onto land. Its lower body has become stronger, and blows from its tail are devastating.
pokedex_entries.shield: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.

pokedex_entries.ruby: This POKéMON has a body of steel. To make its body, ARON feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: ARON has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this POKéMON can demolish even a heavy dump truck. The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal for the POKéMON.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It eats iron to build its steel body. It is a pest that descends from mountains to eat bridges and train tracks.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that is clad in steel armor. A new suit of armor is made when it evolves. The old, discarded armor is salvaged as metal for making iron products.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that covered its whole body and develops a new one.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: In order to build up its steel body, it eats iron ore. This pesky Pokémon is known to eat railroad tracks.
pokedex_entries.x: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
pokedex_entries.y: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that covered its whole body and develops a new one.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: This Pokémon has a body of steel. To make its body, Aron feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Aron has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this Pokémon can demolish even a heavy dump truck. The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal for the Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.sword: It eats iron ore—and sometimes railroad tracks—to build up the steel armor that protects its body.
pokedex_entries.shield: When Aron evolves, its steel armor peels off. In ancient times, people would collect Aron’s shed armor and make good use of it in their daily lives.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It usually lives deep in mountains. But when it’s hungry, it shows up at the foot of the mountains and eats railroad tracks and cars.

pokedex_entries.ruby: AZURILL spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these POKéMON managed to hurl itself a record 33 feet.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: AZURILL’s tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the nutrients this POKéMON needs to grow. AZURILL can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It battles by flinging around its tail, which is bigger than its body. The tail is a flotation device in water.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its tail, which is packed with nutrition, is very bouncy like a rubber ball. On sunny days they gather at the edge of water and splash about for fun.
pokedex_entries.diamond: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
pokedex_entries.pearl: Its tail is filled with nutrients necessary for growth. It plays by bouncing on its tail.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its tail is packed full of the nutrients it needs to grow.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.x: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
pokedex_entries.y: It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Azurill spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these Pokémon managed to hurl itself a record 33 feet.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Azurill’s tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the nutrients this Pokémon needs to grow. Azurill can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.
pokedex_entries.sword: The ball on Azurill’s tail bounces like a rubber ball, and it’s full of the nutrients the Pokémon needs to grow.
pokedex_entries.shield: Although Azurill are normally docile, an angry one will swing around the big ball on its tail and try to smash its opponents.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It’s a Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: Its tail is filled with nutrients necessary for growth. It plays by bouncing on its tail.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.violet: Its tail is packed full of the nutrients it needs to grow.

pokedex_entries.ruby: BAGON has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this POKéMON hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: BAGON harbors a never-ending dream of one day soaring high among the clouds. As if trying to dispel its frustration over its inability to fly, this POKéMON slams its hard head against huge rocks and shatters them into pebbles.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Although it is small, this POKéMON is very powerful because its body is a bundle of muscles. It launches head-butts with its ironlike skull.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its well-developed neck muscles and ironlike head can smash boulders into pieces.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
pokedex_entries.x: Its well-developed neck muscles and iron-like head can smash boulders into pieces.
pokedex_entries.y: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Bagon has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this Pokémon hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Bagon harbors a never-ending dream of one day soaring high among the clouds. As if trying to dispel its frustration over its inability to fly, this Pokémon slams its hard head against huge rocks and shatters them into pebbles.
pokedex_entries.sun: Its belief that it will be able to fly one day is apparently the influence of information carried in its genes.
pokedex_entries.moon: With its steel-hard stone head, it headbutts indiscriminately. This is because of the stress it feels at being unable to fly.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Whenever it sees bird Pokémon flying through the sky, it becomes envious and smashes its surroundings to bits with headbutts.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Some theories suggest that its behavior of forcefully bashing its head into things stimulates cells that affect its evolution.
pokedex_entries.sword: Bagon jumps off cliffs every day, trying to grow stronger so that someday it will be able to fly.
pokedex_entries.shield: Bagon is a solitary Pokémon that doesn’t form groups with others of its kind. It also has a head hard enough to cleave a boulder in one strike.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.
pokedex_entries.violet: Its belief that it will be able to fly one day is apparently the influence of information carried in its genes.

pokedex_entries.ruby: BALTOY moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this POKéMON living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: As soon as it spots others of its kind, BALTOY congregates with them and then begins crying noisily in unison. This POKéMON sleeps while cleverly balancing itself on its one foot.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A BALTOY moves by spinning on its single foot. It has been depicted in murals adorning the walls of a once-bustling city in an ancient age.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some BALTOY have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Discovered in ancient ruins, it moves by spinning around and forms a group when it finds others.
pokedex_entries.x: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedex_entries.y: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Baltoy moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this Pokémon living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: As soon as it spots others of its kind, Baltoy congregates with them and then begins crying noisily in unison. This Pokémon sleeps while cleverly balancing itself on its one foot.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Depictions of Pokémon similar to Baltoy have been found on the walls of caves where primitive humans lived.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: When they find others of their kind, they cry out loudly and gather together. Large numbers of them can be found in old graveyards.
pokedex_entries.sword: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedex_entries.shield: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

pokedex_entries.ruby: BANETTE generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: A cursed energy permeated the stuffing of a discarded and forgotten plush doll, giving it new life as BANETTE. The POKéMON’s energy would escape if it were to ever open its mouth.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a POKéMON. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.
pokedex_entries.emerald: An abandoned plush doll became this POKéMON. They are said to live in garbage dumps and wander about in search of the children that threw them away.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: This Pokémon developed from an abandoned doll that amassed a grudge. It is seen in dark alleys.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge of being thrown away. It seeks the child who disowned it.
pokedex_entries.x: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
pokedex_entries.y: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Banette generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This Pokémon was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: A cursed energy permeated the stuffing of a discarded and forgotten plush doll, giving it new life as Banette. The Pokémon’s energy would escape if it were to ever open its mouth.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It’s a stuffed toy that was thrown away and became possessed, ever searching for the one who threw it away so it can exact its revenge.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: A doll bore a grudge over being junked, and it became a Pokémon. It seeks the child that disowned it.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: This Pokémon developed from an abandoned doll that amassed a grudge. It is seen in dark alleys.
pokedex_entries.violet: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

pokedex_entries.ruby: BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: BARBOACH’s body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this POKéMON just slips out of the enemy’s grip. This POKéMON grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its body is covered with a slimy film. The film acts as a barrier to prevent germs in muddy water from entering the BARBOACH’s body.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
pokedex_entries.pearl: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: BARBOACH uses its whiskers to taste things just as a person uses his or her tongue to taste things.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
pokedex_entries.x: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
pokedex_entries.y: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Barboach’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This Pokémon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Barboach’s body is covered with a slimy film. If a foe grabs it, this Pokémon just slips out of the enemy’s grip. This Pokémon grows weak if the slimy coating dries up.
pokedex_entries.sun: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey’s location.
pokedex_entries.moon: Its slippery body is hard to grasp, so much so that there are festivals where people compete to see how many they can catch barehanded.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Its entire body is gooey. When pecked at by bird Pokémon, it slips and slides its way to freedom.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its whiskers are filled with nerves. They can sense smells and flavors just as a person’s nose or tongue would.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
pokedex_entries.shield: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Makes its home in swamps with murky water. The poor visibility hides this Pokémon from predators, and the slime on its body makes grasping it difficult.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey’s location.
pokedex_entries.violet: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.

pokedex_entries.ruby: BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY is sure to come looking for pollen.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: BEAUTIFLY has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This POKéMON rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its colorfully patterned wings are its most prominent feature. It flies through flower-covered fields collecting pollen. It attacks ferociously when angered.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
pokedex_entries.pearl: When flower fields bloom, it flits around, collecting pollen. Despite its appearance, it is savage.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
pokedex_entries.x: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
pokedex_entries.y: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Beautifly’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: When flower fields bloom, it flits around, collecting pollen. Despite its appearance, it is savage.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: A colorful and incredibly beautiful but also greedy Pokémon. In an effort to keep its favorite food all to itself, it will chase away Combee as they try to gather nectar.

pokedex_entries.ruby: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout BELDUM’s body. This POKéMON communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: BELDUM keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth’s natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this POKéMON anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.
pokedex_entries.emerald: When BELDUM gather in a swarm, they move in perfect unison as if they were but one POKéMON. They communicate with each other using brain waves.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground’s natural magnetism, letting it float.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Its cells are all magnetic, and it communicates with others by using magnetic pulses.
pokedex_entries.x: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground’s natural magnetism, letting it float.
pokedex_entries.y: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout Beldum’s body. This Pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Beldum keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth’s natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this Pokémon anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.
pokedex_entries.sun: Its cells are all magnets. It uses magnetism to communicate with others of its kind.
pokedex_entries.moon: With magnetic traction, it pulls its opponents in close. When they’re in range, it slashes them with its rear claws.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Instead of blood, magnetism flows through its body. When it’s feeling bad, try giving it a magnet.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: If you anger it, it will do more than rampage. It will also burst out strong magnetism, causing nearby machines to break.
pokedex_entries.sword: From its rear, Beldum emits a magnetic force that rapidly pulls opponents in. They get skewered on Beldum’s sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.shield: The cells in this Pokémon’s body are composed of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic forces flow through Beldum’s body.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: They converse with one another by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

pokedex_entries.ruby: In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: BLAZIKEN has incredibly strong legs - it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This POKéMON’s blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.
pokedex_entries.x: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
pokedex_entries.y: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this Pokémon’s wrists burn.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.

pokedex_entries.ruby: BRELOOM closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This POKéMON’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: The seeds ringing BRELOOM’s tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this POKéMON’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: The seeds on its tail are made of toxic spores. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible punches.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It scatters spores from holes in the cap on its head. It loves warm and humid climates. It feeds on trees and plants in fields and forests.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
pokedex_entries.x: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
pokedex_entries.y: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This Pokémon’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this Pokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
pokedex_entries.violet: The seeds on its tail are made of toxic spores. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible punches.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CACNEA lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this POKéMON shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower CACNEA grows. This POKéMON battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
pokedex_entries.emerald: CACNEA live in deserts with virtually no rainfall. It battles by swinging its thick, spiked arms. Once a year, a yellow flower blooms.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.
pokedex_entries.x: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.
pokedex_entries.y: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Cacnea lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this Pokémon shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It prefers harsh environments, such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
pokedex_entries.violet: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.

pokedex_entries.ruby: During the daytime, CACTURNE remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This POKéMON becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, CACTURNE will follow in a ragtag group. The POKéMON are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert’s heat.
pokedex_entries.emerald: After spending thousands of years in harsh deserts, its blood transformed into the same substances as sand. It is nocturnal, so it hunts at night.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.
pokedex_entries.x: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.
pokedex_entries.y: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: During the daytime, Cacturne remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This Pokémon becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.
pokedex_entries.violet: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert’s heat.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: The humps on CAMERUPT’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This POKéMON apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that lives in the crater of a volcano. Every 10 years, the volcanoes on its back erupt violently. Research is under way on the cause of eruption.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It lives in the crater of a volcano. It is well known that the humps on its back erupt every 10 years.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years--or whenever it becomes really angry.
pokedex_entries.x: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years--or whenever it becomes really angry.
pokedex_entries.y: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It lives in the crater of a volcano. It is well known that the humps on its back erupt every 10 years.
pokedex_entries.violet: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CARVANHA’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this POKéMON.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: If anything invades CARVANHA’s territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this POKéMON turns suddenly timid.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
pokedex_entries.emerald: CARVANHA attack ships in swarms, making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious POKéMON, it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.
pokedex_entries.x: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
pokedex_entries.y: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Carvanha’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: If anything invades Carvanha’s territory, it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs. On its own, however, this Pokémon turns suddenly timid.
pokedex_entries.sun: Each school has its own territory. Any intruders are mercilessly attacked with fangs bared.
pokedex_entries.moon: If they scent the faintest trace of blood, they rush to attack en masse. When alone, they’re rather cowardly.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: They’re such cowards that they won’t hunt alone. When five or so of them get together, they suddenly turn ferocious!
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: With its sturdy jaws and fangs, it can easily chomp wooden boats to splinters. It fights with Basculin over food.
pokedex_entries.sword: It won’t attack while it’s alone—not even if it spots prey. Instead, it waits for other Carvanha to join it, and then the Pokémon attack as a group.
pokedex_entries.shield: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CASCOON makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This POKéMON prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: If it is attacked, CASCOON remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This POKéMON will also not forget the pain it endured.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
pokedex_entries.emerald: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
pokedex_entries.pearl: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It endures attacks with patience, because the more pain before evolution, the sturdier it becomes.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
pokedex_entries.x: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
pokedex_entries.y: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not forget the pain it endured.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: The silk coating its body is thin but sufficiently strong. Cascoon’s silk has a luster and texture superior to that of Silcoon’s, and clothes made using Cascoon silk are regarded as top-notch.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CASTFORM’s appearance changes with the weather. This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: CASTFORM borrows the power of nature to transform itself into the guises of the sun, rain clouds, and snow clouds. This POKéMON’s feelings change with the weather.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It alters its form depending on the weather. Changes in the climate such as the temperature and humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Temperature and weather affect its cellular structure, so this Pokémon changes form according to the weather.
pokedex_entries.x: This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.
pokedex_entries.y: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Castform’s appearance changes with the weather. This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Castform borrows the power of nature to transform itself into the guises of the sun, rain, and snow-clouds. This Pokémon’s feelings change with the weather.
pokedex_entries.sun: It changes its form depending on the weather. Changes in the temperature or humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.
pokedex_entries.moon: Its form changes on its own, due to its cells’ sensitive reactions to temperature and humidity.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Although its form changes with the weather, that is apparently the result of a chemical reaction and not the result of its own free will.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform’s disposition!
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CHIMECHO makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this POKéMON becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: In high winds, CHIMECHO cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This POKéMON plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It travels by riding on winds. It cleverly uses its long tail to pluck nuts and berries, which it loves to eat.
pokedex_entries.emerald: They fly about very actively when the hot season arrives. They communicate among themselves using seven different and distinguishing cries.
pokedex_entries.diamond: To knock foes flying, it makes the air shudder with its cries. It converses using seven cries.
pokedex_entries.pearl: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.
pokedex_entries.x: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
pokedex_entries.y: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: To knock foes flying, it makes the air shudder with its cries. It converses using seven cries.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: Chimecho emits ultrasonic cries. It floats on the wind to travel great distances.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Can emit waves of air powerful enough to knock out prey taller than itself. I hypothesize that it amplifies the faint sound of wind within its body.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: CLAMPERL grows while being protected by its rock-hard shell. When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell, it is sure evidence that this POKéMON is getting close to evolution.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A CLAMPERL slams its shell closed on prey to prevent escape. The pearl it creates upon evolution is said to be infused with a mysterious energy.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.
pokedex_entries.x: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.
pokedex_entries.y: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Clamperl’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection—it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown Clamperl’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Clamperl grows while being protected by its rock-hard shell. When its body becomes too large to fit inside the shell, it is sure evidence that this Pokémon is getting close to evolution.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Despite its appearance, it’s carnivorous. It clamps down on its prey with both sides of its shell and doesn’t let go until they stop moving.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This POKéMON moves about while levitating.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: CLAYDOL is an enigma that appeared from a clay statue made by an ancient civilization dating back 20,000 years. This POKéMON shoots beams from both its hands.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A CLAYDOL sleeps while hovering in midair. Its arms are separate from its body. They are kept floating by the POKéMON’s manipulation of psychic power.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.
pokedex_entries.x: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
pokedex_entries.y: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Claydol are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This Pokémon moves about while levitating.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Claydol is an enigma that appeared from a clay statue made by an ancient civilization dating back 20,000 years. This Pokémon shoots beams from both its hands.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: If it gets wet, its body melts. When rain starts to fall, it wraps its whole body up with its psychic powers to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: The ancient people who made it apparently modeled it after something that descended from the sky. It fires beams from both arms.
pokedex_entries.sword: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.
pokedex_entries.shield: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: An ancient clay figurine was exposed to a mysterious ray of light, and it came to life as a Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.ruby: COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: COMBUSKEN battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This POKéMON’s cry is very loud and distracting.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It boosts its concentration by emitting harsh cries. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
pokedex_entries.x: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
pokedex_entries.y: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This Pokémon’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks in one second.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CORPHISH were originally foreign POKéMON that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This POKéMON is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: CORPHISH catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food - it will eat anything. This POKéMON has no trouble living in filthy water.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It came from overseas. It is a very hardy creature that will quickly proliferate, even in polluted streams.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Once it grips prey with its large pincers, it will never let go, no matter what. It is a hardy POKéMON that can thrive in any environment.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
pokedex_entries.x: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
pokedex_entries.y: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Corphish were originally foreign Pokémon that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This Pokémon is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Corphish catches prey with its sharp claws. It has no likes or dislikes when it comes to food—it will eat anything. This Pokémon has no trouble living in filthy water.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Individuals that have been set free by Trainers who could no longer raise them have become common, and they can now be found in Alola.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It can adapt very well to its environment. Feebas and Corphish are about the only Pokémon to live in stagnant ditches.
pokedex_entries.sword: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
pokedex_entries.shield: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CRADILY roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This POKéMON freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: CRADILY’s body serves as an anchor, preventing it from being washed away in rough seas. This POKéMON secretes a strong digestive fluid from its tentacles.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It drags its heavy body along the seafloor. It makes its nest in the shallows of warm seas. CRADILY can be seen on beaches when the tide goes out.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It lives in warm seas. Its heavy body weighs it down so it won’t get washed away in rough weather.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
pokedex_entries.x: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
pokedex_entries.y: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Cradily roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This Pokémon freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Cradily’s body serves as an anchor, preventing it from being washed away in rough seas. This Pokémon secretes a strong digestive fluid from its tentacles.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Normally, it lived on shallow sea shoals. When the tide went out, this Pokémon came up on land to search for prey.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: This carnivorous Pokémon lived in primordial seas. It catches prey in its eight tentacles and dissolves them with digestive fluid as it eats.
pokedex_entries.sword: It has short legs and can’t walk very fast, but its neck and tentacles can extend to over three times their usual length to nab distant prey.
pokedex_entries.shield: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.

pokedex_entries.ruby: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this POKéMON, making them desolate places.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: CRAWDAUNT molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this POKéMON hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A brutish POKéMON that loves to battle. A veteran CRAWDAUNT that has prevailed in hundreds of battles has giant pincers marked with countless scars.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.
pokedex_entries.x: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
pokedex_entries.y: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Crawdaunt has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this Pokémon, making them desolate places.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Crawdaunt molts (sheds) its shell regularly. Immediately after molting, its shell is soft and tender. Until the shell hardens, this Pokémon hides in its streambed burrow to avoid attack from its foes.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Its temperament is rough and it loves to fight, but as soon as its pincers break off, it turns cowardly. It stays timid until they grow back.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its pincers often fall off. Unlike with Crabrawler or Clauncher, the meat in its claws is utterly nasty and stinking.
pokedex_entries.sword: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
pokedex_entries.shield: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.

pokedex_entries.ruby: DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this POKéMON eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: DELCATTY sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other POKéMON approach it as it sleeps, this POKéMON will never fight - it will just move away somewhere else.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: The favorite of trend-conscious female TRAINERS, they are used in competition for their style and fur.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Rather than keeping a permanent lair, it habitually seeks comfortable spots and sleeps there. It is nocturnal and becomes active at dusk.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The reason it does not have a nest is that it simply searches for a clean, comfortable place then sleeps there.
pokedex_entries.x: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
pokedex_entries.y: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokémon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is highly popular among Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.

pokedex_entries.ruby: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this POKéMON’s chest appears to be its brain.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: DEOXYS emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This POKéMON shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
pokedex_entries.firered: This DEOXYS has transformed into its aggressive guise. It can fool enemies by altering its appearance.
pokedex_entries.leafgreen: When it changes form, an aurora appears. It absorbs attacks by altering its cellular structure.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that mutated from an extraterrestrial virus exposed to a laser beam. Its body is configured for superior agility and speed.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.x: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.y: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteorite underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.

pokedex_entries.ruby: DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: DUSCLOPS absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This POKéMON hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do DUSCLOPS’s bidding.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It is thought that its body is hollow with only a spectral ball of fire burning inside. However, no one has been able to confirm this theory as fact.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
pokedex_entries.x: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
pokedex_entries.y: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Dusclops’s body is completely hollow—there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This Pokémon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops’s bidding.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
pokedex_entries.shield: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: There are rumors that peeking inside its bandage-wrapped body will cause one to get pulled in through the gaps between the bandages, never to return. I’ve been too scared to verify.

pokedex_entries.ruby: DUSKULL can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: DUSKULL wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this POKéMON will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A glare from its single scarlet eye makes even burly grown-ups freeze in utter fear. It is a nocturnal POKéMON that roams about under the cloak of darkness.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it’s said.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.
pokedex_entries.x: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
pokedex_entries.y: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it’s said.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this Pokémon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Duskull wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft-told admonishment given to misbehaving children that this Pokémon will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.
pokedex_entries.sword: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.
pokedex_entries.shield: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever the prey goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: I’ve heard that the children of Hisui all begin to behave once they’ve been told the story of how this Pokémon roams about before the witching hour to spirit away misbehaving children.

pokedex_entries.ruby: DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: When DUSTOX flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This POKéMON searches for food using its antennae like radar.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It scatters horribly toxic dust when it senses danger. They tend to gather in the glow of streetlamps at night.
