pokedex_entries.emerald: It is a nocturnal POKéMON that flies from fields and mountains to the attraction of streetlights at night. It looses highly toxic powder from its wings.
pokedex_entries.diamond: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It scatters its fine dust all over when it is attacked. It is a nocturnal Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.x: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.y: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using its antennae like radar.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: Dustox are nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Tends to be drawn to bonfires on dark nights. Difficult to chase away from settlements because of the way it scatters highly toxic scales.

pokedex_entries.ruby: ELECTRIKE stores electricity in its long body hair. This POKéMON stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: ELECTRIKE runs faster than the human eye can follow. The friction from running is converted into electricity, which is then stored in this POKéMON’s fur.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It generates electricity using friction from the atmosphere. In seasons with especially arid air, its entire body blazes with violent showers of sparks.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
pokedex_entries.x: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
pokedex_entries.y: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Electrike stores electricity in its long body hair. This Pokémon stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Electrike runs faster than the human eye can follow. The friction from running is converted into electricity, which is then stored in this Pokémon’s fur.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Friction between the air and its fur produces static electricity. When Electrike runs, it makes a crackling sound.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Static electricity builds up all over its body as strands of its long fur rub together. This Pokémon boasts incredible speed.
pokedex_entries.sword: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
pokedex_entries.shield: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.

pokedex_entries.ruby: EXPLOUD triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this POKéMON violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: EXPLOUD communicates its feelings to the others by emitting whistle-like sounds from the tubes on its body. This POKéMON only raises its voice when it is in battle.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It emits a variety of sounds from the holes all over its body. Its loud cries can be heard from over six miles away.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It has sound-generating organs all over its body. It communicates with others by adjusting the tone and volume of the cries it emits.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its roar in battle shakes the ground like a tremor--or like an earthquake has struck.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
pokedex_entries.x: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
pokedex_entries.y: Its roar in battle shakes the ground like a tremor--or like an earthquake has struck.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Exploud triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this Pokémon violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Exploud communicates its feelings to the others by emitting whistle-like sounds from the tubes on its body. This Pokémon only raises its voice when it is in battle.
pokedex_entries.sword: In the past, people would use the loud voices of these Pokémon as a means of communication between distant cities.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon can do more than just shout. To communicate with others of its kind, it’ll emit all sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.

pokedex_entries.ruby: FEEBAS’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this POKéMON is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: While FEEBAS’s body is in tatters, it has a hardy and tenacious life force that enables it to live anywhere. However, this POKéMON is also slow and dimwitted, making it an easy catch.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Ridiculed for its shabby appearance, it is ignored by researchers. It lives in ponds choked with weeds.
pokedex_entries.emerald: FEEBAS live in ponds that are heavily infested with weeds. Because of its hopelessly shabby appearance, it seems as if few TRAINERS raise it.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It is famous for its shabby appearance. While populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It is the shabbiest Pokémon of all. It forms in schools and lives at the bottom of rivers.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
pokedex_entries.x: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
pokedex_entries.y: It is the shabbiest Pokémon of all. It forms in schools and lives at the bottom of rivers.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Feebas’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this Pokémon is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: While Feebas’s body is in tatters, it has a hardy and tenacious life force that enables it to live anywhere. However, this Pokémon is also slow and dimwitted, making it an easy catch.
pokedex_entries.sun: A tough Pokémon that is perfectly fine even in dirty water. However, due to its ragged, shabby appearance, it isn’t popular.
pokedex_entries.moon: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: They look ragged, so no one catches them. They look like they’d taste bad, so predators won’t eat them. And their numbers continue to grow.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Because of its wretched appearance, most people pay it no attention, but there are some who collect Feebas—and Feebas alone!
pokedex_entries.sword: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
pokedex_entries.shield: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: They are famous for their shabby appearance. Although populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.

pokedex_entries.ruby: FLYGON is nicknamed “the elemental spirit of the desert.” Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this POKéMON is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: FLYGON whips up a sandstorm by flapping its wings. The wings create a series of notes that sound like singing. Because the “singing” is the only thing that can be heard in a sandstorm, this POKéMON is said to be the desert spirit.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
pokedex_entries.emerald: The flapping of its wings sounds like singing. To prevent detection by enemies, it hides itself by flapping up a cloud of desert sand.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as “The Desert Spirit.”
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It is nicknamed “The Desert Spirit” because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as “The Desert Spirit.”
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Known as “The Desert Spirit,” this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.
pokedex_entries.x: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
pokedex_entries.y: Known as “The Desert Spirit,” this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Flygon is nicknamed “the elemental spirit of the desert.” Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this Pokémon is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Flygon whips up a sandstorm by flapping its wings. The wings create a series of notes that sound like singing. Because the “singing” is the only thing that can be heard in a sandstorm, this Pokémon is said to be the desert spirit.
pokedex_entries.sun: The flapping of its wings sounds something like singing. Those lured by the sound are enveloped in a sandstorm, becoming Flygon’s prey.
pokedex_entries.moon: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: By flapping their wings, Flygon cause sandstorms that conceal Krookodile. The team then splits the prey they catch.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: People continue to have their hearts stolen by its enchanting songs and find themselves stranded in the desert.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.
pokedex_entries.shield: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as the Desert Spirit.

pokedex_entries.ruby: GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its TRAINER, this POKéMON is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: GARDEVOIR has the psychokinetic power to distort the dimensions and create a small black hole. This POKéMON will try to protect its TRAINER even at the risk of its own life.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its TRAINER.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with psychic power. It will give its life to protect its TRAINER.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: It will try to guard its trusted Trainer with its life. It has the ability to see the future.
pokedex_entries.platinum: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It unleashes psychokinetic energy at full power when protecting a Trainer it has bonded closely with.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
pokedex_entries.x: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
pokedex_entries.y: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Gardevoir has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its Trainer, this Pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Gardevoir has the psychokinetic power to distort the dimensions and create a small black hole. This Pokémon will try to protect its Trainer even at the risk of its own life.
pokedex_entries.sword: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.
pokedex_entries.shield: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It will try to guard its trusted Trainer with its life. It has the ability to see the future.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: It will dedicate itself to defending a master it has come to adore. Its pure white dress, reminiscent of those worn by ladies of nobility, is the dress of one who is willing to risk their life.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
pokedex_entries.violet: It unleashes psychokinetic energy at full power when protecting a Trainer it has bonded closely with.

pokedex_entries.ruby: GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This POKéMON has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: GLALIE has the ability to freely control ice. For example, it can instantly freeze its foe solid. After immobilizing its foe in ice, this POKéMON enjoys eating it in leisurely fashion.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A GLALIE has the power to instantaneously freeze moisture in the atmosphere. A dazzling cloud of diamondlike ice crystals forms around its body.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: To protect itself, it clads its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.
pokedex_entries.x: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
pokedex_entries.y: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This Pokémon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Glalie has the ability to freely control ice. For example, it can instantly freeze its prey solid. After immobilizing its prey in ice, this Pokémon enjoys eating it in leisurely fashion.
pokedex_entries.sun: Legend says a boulder on an icy mountain absorbed the distress and regrets of a stranded mountaineer, giving rise to Glalie.
pokedex_entries.moon: Its prey is instantaneously frozen stiff by the cold air it exhales from its huge mouth. While they’re in that frozen state, it gobbles them up.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It freezes its prey and chews them whole. However, it prefers to eat Pokémon like Vanillite that are already frozen.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its actual body is a rock that isn’t particularly hard. Glalie absorbs moisture from the air and drapes itself in an armor of ice.
pokedex_entries.sword: It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
pokedex_entries.shield: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: It covers its body with an armor of ice harder than steel. Uses its breath to freeze prey, which it then devours as if they were frozen desserts.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Its prey is instantaneously frozen stiff by the cold air it exhales from its huge mouth. While they’re in that frozen state, it gobbles them up.
pokedex_entries.violet: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.

pokedex_entries.ruby: GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: Although GOREBYSS is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming, it is also cruel. When it spots prey, this POKéMON inserts its thin mouth into the prey’s body and drains the prey of its body fluids.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A GOREBYSS siphons the body fluids of prey through its thin, tubular mouth. Its light pink body color turns vivid when it finishes feeding.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its pink body becomes more vivid with the rise of water temperatures in the springtime.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
pokedex_entries.x: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
pokedex_entries.y: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Gorebyss lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this Pokémon’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Although Gorebyss is the very picture of elegance and beauty while swimming, it is also cruel. When it spots prey, this Pokémon inserts its thin mouth into the prey’s body and drains the prey of its body fluids.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The color of its body changes with the water temperature. The coloration of Gorebyss in Alola is almost blindingly vivid.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.

pokedex_entries.ruby: GROUDON has long been described in mythology as the POKéMON that raised lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: GROUDON has the power to scatter rain clouds and make water evaporate with light and heat. It came as a savior to people who had been suffering from terrible floods.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: This legendary POKéMON is said to represent the land. It went to sleep after dueling KYOGRE.
pokedex_entries.emerald: GROUDON has appeared in mythology as the creator of the land. It sleeps in magma underground and is said to make volcanoes erupt on awakening.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought KYOGRE long ago.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with KYOGRE.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.
pokedex_entries.x: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.
pokedex_entries.y: This legendary Pokémon is said to represent the land. It went to sleep after dueling Kyogre.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.

pokedex_entries.ruby: The leaves growing out of GROVYLE’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This POKéMON is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: This POKéMON adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no POKéMON can ever hope to catch a fleeing GROVYLE however fast they may be.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Leaves grow out of this POKéMON’s body. They help obscure a GROVYLE from the eyes of its enemies while it is in a thickly overgrown forest.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It leaps from tree branch to tree branch quite swiftly. It shows astounding agility.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
pokedex_entries.x: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.
pokedex_entries.y: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: The leaves growing out of Grovyle’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokémon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.

pokedex_entries.ruby: GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this POKéMON uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This POKéMON’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It can gain control over foes by doing odd dance steps. The black pearls on its forehead are precious gems.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It stores power in the black pearls on its forehead. When it uses psychic power, it performs an odd dance step. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It uses black pearls to amplify its psycho-power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It can perform odd dance steps to influence foes. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It uses black pearls to amplify its psycho-power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.
pokedex_entries.x: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.
pokedex_entries.y: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this Pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It can perform odd dance steps to influence foes. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.
pokedex_entries.violet: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.

pokedex_entries.ruby: Virtually all of GULPIN’s body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This POKéMON’s stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: Most of GULPIN’s body is made up of its stomach - its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This POKéMON’s stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.
pokedex_entries.emerald: This POKéMON’s stomach fluid can even digest scrap iron. In one gulp, it can swallow something that is as large as itself.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
pokedex_entries.x: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.
pokedex_entries.y: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Virtually all of Gulpin’s body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This Pokémon’s stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Most of Gulpin’s body is made up of its stomach—its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon’s stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.
pokedex_entries.violet: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.

pokedex_entries.ruby: HARIYAMA practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this POKéMON’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: HARIYAMA’s thick body may appear fat, but it is actually a hunk of solid muscle. If this POKéMON bears down and tightens all its muscles, its body becomes as hard as a rock.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It has the habit of challenging others without hesitation to tests of strength. It’s been known to stand on train tracks and stop trains using forearm thrusts.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
pokedex_entries.x: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
pokedex_entries.y: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Hariyama practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this Pokémon’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Hariyama’s thick body may appear fat, but it is actually a hunk of solid muscle. If this Pokémon bears down and tightens all its muscles, its body becomes as hard as a rock.
pokedex_entries.sun: It is known for its fantastic strength, but as it grows older, it focuses more on training Makuhita.
pokedex_entries.moon: They love to compare their freakish strength— strength enough to send a truck flying with a single slap.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Although they enjoy comparing their strength, they’re also kind. They value etiquette, praising opponents they battle.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Hariyama that are big and fat aren’t necessarily strong. There are some small ones that move nimbly and use moves skillfully.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can send a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.
pokedex_entries.violet: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.

pokedex_entries.ruby: HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: HUNTAIL’s tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey, then swallows the prey whole with its large, gaping mouth. This POKéMON swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
pokedex_entries.emerald: To withstand the crushing pressure of water deep under the sea, its spine is very thick and sturdy. Its tail, which is shaped like a small fish, has eyes that light up.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It lives deep in the pitch-dark sea. It attracts prey by moving its tail in mimicry of a small animal.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
pokedex_entries.x: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
pokedex_entries.y: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Huntail’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This Pokémon’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Huntail’s tail is shaped like a fish. It uses the tail to attract prey, then swallows the prey whole with its large, gaping mouth. This Pokémon swims by wiggling its slender body like a snake.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It’s not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to lure in its prey and then gulps them down as soon as they get close.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

pokedex_entries.ruby: ILLUMISE attracts a swarm of VOLBEAT using a sweet fragrance. Once the VOLBEAT have gathered, this POKéMON leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: ILLUMISE leads a flight of illuminated VOLBEAT to draw signs in the night sky. This POKéMON is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It guides VOLBEAT to draw signs in night skies. There are scientists that study the patterns it creates.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A nocturnal POKéMON that becomes active upon nightfall. It leads a VOLBEAT swarm to draw patterns in the night sky. Over 200 different patterns have been confirmed.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: With its sweet aroma, it guides VOLBEAT to draw signs with light in the night sky.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of VOLBEAT, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.
pokedex_entries.x: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
pokedex_entries.y: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Illumise attracts a swarm of Volbeat using a sweet fragrance. Once the Volbeat have gathered, this Pokémon leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.

pokedex_entries.ruby: A legend states that JIRACHI will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: JIRACHI will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is said to make any wish come true. It is awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.
pokedex_entries.emerald: JIRACHI is said to make wishes come true. While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell envelops the body to protect it from enemies.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
pokedex_entries.x: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.
pokedex_entries.y: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.
pokedex_entries.sword: Once every 1,000 years, the singing of a pure voice will rouse this Pokémon from its near-perpetual slumber. It wakes for only seven days.
pokedex_entries.shield: It’s believed that when this Pokémon wakes from its 1,000-year slumber, it will grant any wishes written on the notes attached to its head.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is said to wake up for just seven days every 1,000 years and use its power to grant any wish.

pokedex_entries.ruby: KECLEON is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception - this POKéMON can’t change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: KECLEON alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It changes body color to blend in with its surroundings. It also changes color if it is happy or sad.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that has the ability to alter its body colors to match its surroundings. A KECLEON reverts to its original colors if it is startled.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
pokedex_entries.x: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.
pokedex_entries.y: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Kecleon is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception—this Pokémon can’t change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Kecleon alters its body coloration to blend in with its surroundings, allowing it to sneak up on its prey unnoticed. Then it lashes out with its long, stretchy tongue to instantly ensnare the unsuspecting target.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It changes its hue to blend into its surroundings. If no one takes notice of it for too long, it will pout and never reveal itself.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its color changes for concealment and also when its mood or health changes. The darker the color, the healthier it is.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.

pokedex_entries.ruby: It is said that a KIRLIA that is exposed to the positive emotions of its TRAINER grows beautiful. This POKéMON controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: KIRLIA uses the horns on its head to amplify its psychokinetic power. When the POKéMON uses its power, the air around it becomes distorted, creating mirages of nonexistent scenery.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: The cheerful spirit of its TRAINER gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A KIRLIA has the psychic power to create a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: It is highly perceptive of its Trainer’s feelings. It dances when it is feeling happy.
pokedex_entries.platinum: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
pokedex_entries.x: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
pokedex_entries.y: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: It is said that a Kirlia that is exposed to the positive emotions of its Trainer grows beautiful. This Pokémon controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Kirlia uses the horns on its head to amplify its psychokinetic power. When the Pokémon uses its power, the air around it becomes distorted, creating mirages of nonexistent scenery.
pokedex_entries.sword: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
pokedex_entries.shield: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is highly perceptive of its Trainer’s feelings. It dances when it is feeling happy.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: It resembles a maiden in appearance, but it wields strange powers to project visions of paradise. I suspect the crimson ornaments on its head are the key to its abilities.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
pokedex_entries.violet: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.

pokedex_entries.ruby: KYOGRE has the power to create massive rain clouds that cover the entire sky and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were suffering from droughts.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: KYOGRE is named in mythology as the POKéMON that expanded the sea by covering the land with torrential rains and towering tidal waves. It took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with GROUDON.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: This POKéMON is said to have expanded the sea by bringing heavy rains. It has the power to control water.
pokedex_entries.emerald: KYOGRE has appeared in mythology as the creator of the sea. After long years of feuding with GROUDON, it took to sleep at the bottom of the sea.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with GROUDON.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
pokedex_entries.x: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.
pokedex_entries.y: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LAIRON tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This POKéMON makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LAIRON feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makes its nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result, the POKéMON often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.
pokedex_entries.emerald: When two LAIRON meet in the wild, they fight for territory by bashing into each other with their steel bodies. The sound of their collision carries for miles.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Lairon fight over territory, and when their steel bodies collide, sparks fly.
pokedex_entries.x: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
pokedex_entries.y: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Lairon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This Pokémon makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Lairon feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makes its nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result, the Pokémon often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.
pokedex_entries.sword: Lairon live in mountains brimming with spring water and iron ore, so these Pokémon often came into conflict with humans in the past.
pokedex_entries.shield: During territorial disputes, Lairon fight by slamming into each other. Close inspection of their steel armor reveals scratches and dents.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LATIAS is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LATIAS is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The POKéMON enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.
pokedex_entries.emerald: They make a small herd of only several members. They rarely make contact with people or other POKéMON. They disappear if they sense enemies.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
pokedex_entries.x: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.
pokedex_entries.y: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this Pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LATIOS has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This POKéMON is intelligent and understands human speech.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LATIOS will only open its heart to a TRAINER with a compassionate spirit. This POKéMON can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It has a docile temperament and dislikes fighting. Tucking in its forelegs, it can fly faster than a jet plane.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Even in hiding, it can detect the locations of others and sense their emotions since it has telepathy. Its intelligence allows it to understand human languages.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that dislikes fighting.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
pokedex_entries.x: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
pokedex_entries.y: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that dislikes fighting.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is a highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its forelegs in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LILEEP became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LILEEP is an ancient POKéMON that was regenerated from a fossil. It remains permanently anchored to a rock. From its immobile perch, this POKéMON intently scans for prey with its two eyes.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It became extinct roughly 100 million years ago. It was regenerated from a fossil using advanced techniques.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It disguises itself as seaweed by making its tentacles sway. Unsuspecting prey that come too close are swallowed whole. It became extinct 100 million years ago.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
pokedex_entries.x: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
pokedex_entries.y: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Lileep became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient Pokémon attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Lileep is an ancient Pokémon that was regenerated from a fossil. It remains permanently anchored to a rock. From its immobile perch, this Pokémon intently scans for prey with its two eyes.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: In ancient times, it lived in warm seas. It disguised itself as seaweed to ambush its prey and devoured them whole when they got close.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It sticks to rocks with its powerful suckers and can’t be washed away no matter how rough the surf gets.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. Lileep once lived in warm seas that existed approximately 100,000,000 years ago.
pokedex_entries.shield: Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey comes close, this Pokémon entangles it with petallike tentacles.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LINOONE always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by gently curving roads.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: When hunting, LINOONE will make a beeline straight for the prey at a full run. While this POKéMON is capable of topping 60 mph, it has to come to a screeching halt before it can turn.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: When running in a straight line, it can top 60 miles per hour. However, it has a tough time with curved roads.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It is exceedingly fast if it only has to run in a straight line. When it spots pond-dwelling prey underwater, it quickly leaps in and catches it with its sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
pokedex_entries.x: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
pokedex_entries.y: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Linoone always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This Pokémon is very challenged by gently curving roads.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: When hunting, Linoone will make a beeline straight for the prey at a full run. While this Pokémon is capable of topping 60 mph, it has to come to a screeching halt before it can turn.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its fur is strong and supple. Shaving brushes made with shed Linoone hairs are highly prized.
pokedex_entries.shield: It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws to bring down prey. Running along winding paths is not its strong suit.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LOMBRE is nocturnal - it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief-maker. When this POKéMON spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LOMBRE’s entire body is covered by a slippery, slimy film. It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this POKéMON’s hands. LOMBRE is often mistaken for a human child.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.
pokedex_entries.emerald: In the evening, it takes great delight in popping out of rivers and startling people. It feeds on aquatic moss that grows on rocks in the riverbed.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall. It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow in the riverbed.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
pokedex_entries.x: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water-grass by day and becomes active at night.
pokedex_entries.y: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Lombre is nocturnal—it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief maker. When this Pokémon spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Lombre’s entire body is covered by a slippery, slimy film. It feels horribly unpleasant to be touched by this Pokémon’s hands. Lombre is often mistaken for a human child.
pokedex_entries.sword: It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall. It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow in the riverbed.
pokedex_entries.shield: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LOTAD live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this POKéMON travels on land in search of clean water.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LOTAD is said to have dwelled on land before. However, this POKéMON is thought to have returned to water because the leaf on its head grew large and heavy. It now lives by floating atop the water.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
pokedex_entries.emerald: This POKéMON lives in ponds with clean water. It is known to ferry small POKéMON across ponds by carrying them on the broad leaf on its head.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land. That is how it began to live floating in the water.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.
pokedex_entries.x: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.
pokedex_entries.y: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Lotad live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this Pokémon travels on land in search of clean water.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Lotad is said to have dwelled on land before. However, this Pokémon is thought to have returned to water because the leaf on its head grew large and heavy. It now lives by floating atop the water.
pokedex_entries.sword: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
pokedex_entries.shield: Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land. That is how it began to live floating in the water.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry for Pokémon that can’t swim.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LOUDRED’s bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This POKéMON’s round ears serve as loudspeakers.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LOUDRED shouts while stamping its feet. After it finishes shouting, this POKéMON becomes incapable of hearing anything for a while. This is considered to be a weak point.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: When it stamps its feet and bellows, it generates ultrasonic waves that can blow apart a house.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It positions the round speakers on its head to assail foes with ultrasonic waves at massive volume. It builds power by stomping the ground.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then uses its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
pokedex_entries.x: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then uses its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
pokedex_entries.y: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Loudred’s bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This Pokémon’s round ears serve as loudspeakers.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Loudred shouts while stamping its feet. After it finishes shouting, this Pokémon becomes incapable of hearing anything for a while. This is considered to be a weak point.
pokedex_entries.sword: Loudred’s ears serve as speakers, and they can put out sound waves powerful enough to blow away a house.
pokedex_entries.shield: The force of this Pokémon’s loud voice isn’t just the sound—it’s also the wave of air pressure that blows opponents away and damages them.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LUDICOLO begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This POKéMON is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: Upon hearing an upbeat and cheerful rhythm, the cells in LUDICOLO’s body become very energetic and active. Even in battle, this POKéMON will exhibit an amazing amount of power.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates LUDICOLO’s cells, making it more powerful.
pokedex_entries.emerald: When it hears festive music, all the cells in its body become stimulated, and it begins moving in rhythm. It does not quail even when it faces a tough opponent.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.
pokedex_entries.x: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.
pokedex_entries.y: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Ludicolo begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This Pokémon is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Upon hearing an upbeat and cheerful rhythm, the cells in Ludicolo’s body become very energetic and active. Even in battle, this Pokémon will exhibit an amazing amount of power.
pokedex_entries.sword: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.
pokedex_entries.shield: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LUNATONE was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. As a result, some people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LUNATONE becomes active around the time of the full moon. Instead of walking, it moves by floating in midair. The POKéMON’s intimidating red eyes cause all those who see it to become transfixed with fear.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its health ebbs and flows with the lunar cycle. It brims with power when exposed to the light of the full moon.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It becomes very active on the night of a full moon. This POKéMON was first discovered 40 years ago at the site of a meteor strike.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It’s active on the night of a full moon.
pokedex_entries.x: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
pokedex_entries.y: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Lunatone was discovered at a location where a meteoroid fell. As a result, some people theorize that this Pokémon came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Lunatone becomes active around the time of the full moon. Instead of walking, it moves by floating in midair. The Pokémon’s intimidating red eyes cause all those who see it to become transfixed with fear.
pokedex_entries.sword: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It’s active on the night of a full moon.
pokedex_entries.shield: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It becomes active on nights with a full moon, so it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.

pokedex_entries.ruby: LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: LUVDISC’s heart-shaped body is a symbol of love and romance. It is said that any couple meeting this POKéMON is promised a loving relationship that never ends.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: During the spawning season, countless LUVDISC congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
pokedex_entries.emerald: LUVDISC make the branches of CORSOLA their nests. There is a custom from long ago of giving a LUVDISC as a gift to express one’s feelings of love.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a LUVDISC to someone you love.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
pokedex_entries.x: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
pokedex_entries.y: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Luvdisc live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped Pokémon earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Luvdisc’s heart-shaped body is a symbol of love and romance. It is said that any couple meeting this Pokémon is promised a loving relationship that never ends.
pokedex_entries.sun: If a Luvdisc is left on its own, it becomes despondent, leaving itself open to attack. That is when Pelipper snatch them up.
pokedex_entries.moon: Loving couples have a soft spot for this Pokémon, so honeymoon hotels often release this Pokémon into their pools.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: There was an era when it was overfished due to the rumor that having one of its heart-shaped scales would enable you to find a sweetheart.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Luvdisc makes its home in coral reefs in warm seas. It especially likes sleeping in the space between Corsola’s branches.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It lives in warm seas. It is said that couples who find this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a Luvdisc to someone you love.
pokedex_entries.violet: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.

pokedex_entries.ruby: MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this POKéMON stores more energy in its body for evolving.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: MAKUHITA has a tireless spirit - it will never give up hope. It eats a lot of food, gets plenty of sleep, and it trains very rigorously. By living that way, this POKéMON packs its body with energy.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy POKéMON that can withstand any attack.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It loves to toughen up its body above all else. If you hear quaking rumbles in a cave, it is the sound of MAKUHITA undertaking strenuous training.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
pokedex_entries.x: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
pokedex_entries.y: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Makuhita is tenacious—it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this Pokémon stores more energy in its body for evolving.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Makuhita has a tireless spirit—it will never give up hope. It eats a lot of food, gets plenty of sleep, and it trains very rigorously. By living that way, this Pokémon packs its body with energy.
pokedex_entries.sun: It was originally brought in from another region, but now Makuhita from Alola are more famous.
pokedex_entries.moon: Their daily routine consists of training together first thing in the morning, eating and napping in the afternoon, and then more training afterward.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It practices its slaps by repeatedly slapping tree trunks. It has been known to slap an Exeggutor and get flung away.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: There’s a rumor of a traditional recipe for stew that Trainers can use to raise strong Makuhita.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.
pokedex_entries.violet: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.

pokedex_entries.ruby: MANECTRIC is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this POKéMON creates thunderclouds.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: MANECTRIC discharges strong electricity from its mane. The mane is used for collecting electricity in the atmosphere. This POKéMON creates thunderclouds above its head.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Because lightning falls in their vicinities, MANECTRIC were thought to have been born from lightning. In battle, they create thunderclouds.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its nest can be found where a thunderbolt hits. It is discharging electricity from its mane.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
pokedex_entries.x: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
pokedex_entries.y: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Manectric is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this Pokémon creates thunderclouds.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Manectric discharges strong electricity from its mane. The mane is used for collecting electricity in the atmosphere. This Pokémon creates thunderclouds above its head.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Manectric can be found beneath unnatural thunderclouds. People say it can run at the same speed as lightning striking.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.
pokedex_entries.sword: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.
pokedex_entries.shield: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It discharges electricity from its mane. The Pokémon creates a thundercloud overhead from which to drop lightning bolts.

pokedex_entries.ruby: The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: MARSHTOMP is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This POKéMON’s hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is at its best when on muddy ground with poor footing. It quickly overwhelms foes struggling in mud.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
pokedex_entries.x: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.
pokedex_entries.y: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: The surface of Marshtomp’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This Pokémon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokémon’s hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

pokedex_entries.ruby: MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This POKéMON flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: MASQUERAIN’s antennas have eyelike patterns that usually give it an angry look. If the “eyes” are droopy and appear sad, it is said to be a sign that a heavy rainfall is on its way.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: The antennae have distinctive patterns that look like eyes. When it rains, they grow heavy, making flight impossible.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It intimidates foes with the large eyelike patterns on its antennae. Because it can’t fly if its wings get wet, it shelters itself from rain under large trees and eaves.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction--to and fro and sideways.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
pokedex_entries.x: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
pokedex_entries.y: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction--to and fro and sideways.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This Pokémon flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction—even sideways and backwards—as if it were a helicopter.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Masquerain’s antennas have eyelike patterns that usually give it an angry look. If the “eyes” are droopy and appear sad, it is said to be a sign that a heavy rainfall is on its way.
pokedex_entries.sun: It intimidates enemies with the eye-like patterns on its antennae. Its four wings allow it to fly in any direction.
pokedex_entries.moon: Its wings and antennae don’t cope well with moisture. After a rain, it faces sunward to dry off.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns of its eyespots. If that doesn’t work, it deftly makes its escape on its set of four wings.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its thin, winglike antennae are highly absorbent. It waits out rainy days in tree hollows.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction—to and fro and sideways.
pokedex_entries.violet: The antennae have distinctive patterns that look like eyes. When it rains, they grow heavy, making flight impossible.

pokedex_entries.ruby: MAWILE’s huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, MAWILE chomps it with its gaping jaws.
