pokedex_entries.sapphire: Don’t be taken in by this POKéMON’s cute face - it’s very dangerous. MAWILE fools the foe into letting down its guard, then chomps down with its massive jaws. The steel jaws are really horns that have been transformed.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its giant jaws are actually steel horns that transformed. It fools foes into complacency with its adorable gestures, then chomps them with its huge jaws.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
pokedex_entries.x: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
pokedex_entries.y: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Mawile’s huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, Mawile chomps it with its gaping jaws.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Don’t be taken in by this Pokémon’s cute face—it’s very dangerous. Mawile fools the foe into letting down its guard, then chomps down with its massive jaws. The steel jaws are really horns that have been transformed.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: A cunning and terrifying Pokémon, its cuteness makes opponents let down their guard—and then it swallows them whole with its huge jaws.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It has two mouths. The big jaws on the back of its head can’t taste anything, so that’s the mouth it uses to eat foods it doesn’t like.
pokedex_entries.sword: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
pokedex_entries.shield: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

pokedex_entries.ruby: It is said that through meditation, MEDICHAM heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: Through the power of meditation, MEDICHAM developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This POKéMON is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Through crushingly harsh yoga training, it gained the power to foretell its foe’s actions. It battles with elegant, dance-like movement.
pokedex_entries.diamond: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its movements are elegant.
pokedex_entries.pearl: Through daily meditation, it hones its spiritual power. It can sense what others are thinking.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe’s next move.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.
pokedex_entries.x: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.
pokedex_entries.y: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe’s next move.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: It is said that through meditation, Medicham heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This Pokémon hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its movements are elegant.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: Through daily meditation, it hones its spiritual power. It can sense what others are thinking.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe’s next move.
pokedex_entries.violet: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.

pokedex_entries.ruby: MEDITITE undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this POKéMON always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: MEDITITE heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this POKéMON’s training.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It continually meditates for hours every day. As a result of rigorous and dedicated yoga training, it has tempered its spiritual power so much it can fly.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It never misses its daily yoga workouts, and it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It meditates to heighten its inner energy and to float in the air. It eats one berry a day.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
pokedex_entries.x: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
pokedex_entries.y: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Meditite undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this Pokémon always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this Pokémon’s training.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It meditates in order to build up its mental energy. It’s said to eat just one Berry a day.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It never misses its daily yoga workouts, and it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.
pokedex_entries.violet: It meditates to heighten its inner energy and to float in the air. It eats one berry a day.

pokedex_entries.ruby: METAGROSS has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This POKéMON can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: METAGROSS is the result of two METANG achieving fusion. When hunting, this POKéMON pins the prey to the ground under its massive body. It then eats the helpless victim using the large mouth on its stomach.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is formed by two METANG fusing. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.
pokedex_entries.emerald: METAGROSS has four brains that are joined by a complex neural network. As a result of integration, this POKéMON is smarter than a supercomputer.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: METANG combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It folds its four legs when flying. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: With four linked brains, it’s more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.
pokedex_entries.x: With four linked brains, it’s more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.
pokedex_entries.y: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Metagross has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This Pokémon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Metagross is the result of two Metang achieving fusion. When hunting, this Pokémon pins the prey to the ground under its massive body. It then eats the helpless victim using the large mouth on its stomach.
pokedex_entries.sun: It firmly pins its prey using its four claws and large body. Then the teeth in the mouth on its stomach chew the prey to bits.
pokedex_entries.moon: A linkage of two Metang, this Pokémon can perform any calculation in a flash by utilizing parallel processing in its four brains.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It boasts not only psychic powers but also fantastic strength. It grabs its prey with its four legs and holds them in place with its claws.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It analyzes its opponents with more accuracy than a supercomputer, which enables it to calmly back them into a corner.
pokedex_entries.sword: Because the magnetic powers of these Pokémon get stronger in freezing temperatures, Metagross living on snowy mountains are full of energy.
pokedex_entries.shield: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

pokedex_entries.ruby: When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically, this POKéMON generates strong psychokinetic power.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are joined by a magnetic nervous system. This POKéMON turns its arms to the rear for traveling at high speed.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It floats midair using magnetism. Its body is so tough, even a crash with a jet plane won’t leave a scratch.
pokedex_entries.emerald: The claws tipping its arms pack the destructive power to tear through thick iron sheets as if they were silk. It flies at over 60 miles per hour.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It is formed by two BELDUM joining together. Its steel body won’t be scratched if it collides with a jet.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: When two BELDUM fuse together, a magnetic nervous system places their brains in union.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won’t be scratched if it collides with a jet.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its two brains are linked, amplifying its psychic power.
pokedex_entries.x: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won’t be scratched if it collides with a jet.
pokedex_entries.y: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its two brains are linked, amplifying its psychic power.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: When two Beldum fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically, this Pokémon generates strong psychokinetic power.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: When two Beldum fuse together, Metang is formed. The brains of the Beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. This Pokémon turns its arms to the rear for traveling at high speed.
pokedex_entries.sun: When two Beldum link together, their psychic power is doubled. Their intelligence, however, remains unchanged.
pokedex_entries.moon: It adores magnetic minerals, so it pursues Nosepass at speeds exceeding 60 mph.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: With its two brains, it fires powerful psychic energy to stop its prey in their tracks.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It flies at high speeds around the skies. When it finds its prey, Metang takes a firm grip with its sharp claws and never lets go.
pokedex_entries.sword: Two Beldum have become stuck together via their own magnetic forces. With two brains, the resulting Metang has doubled psychic powers.
pokedex_entries.shield: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won’t be scratched if it collides with a jet.

pokedex_entries.ruby: MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: MIGHTYENA travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the POKéMON to obey only those TRAINERS that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It will always obey the commands of a skilled TRAINER. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
pokedex_entries.emerald: In the wild, MIGHTYENA live in a pack. They never defy their leader’s orders. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.
pokedex_entries.x: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
pokedex_entries.y: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.

pokedex_entries.ruby: MILOTIC is said to be the most beautiful of all the POKéMON. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: MILOTIC live at the bottom of large lakes. When this POKéMON’s body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to restless spirits.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: MILOTIC is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It is said to live at the bottom of large lakes. Considered to be the most beautiful of all POKéMON, it has been depicted in paintings and statues.
pokedex_entries.diamond: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It is the world’s most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring MILOTIC.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It’s said that a glimpse of a MILOTIC and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.
pokedex_entries.x: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
pokedex_entries.y: It is the world’s most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful of all the Pokémon. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Milotic live at the bottom of large lakes. When this Pokémon’s body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to troubled hearts.
pokedex_entries.sun: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
pokedex_entries.moon: It lives at the bottom of clear lakes. In times of war, it shows itself, which soothes people’s minds and hearts.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: While Milotic is said to be the most beautiful Pokémon, Trainers who like Feebas and have raised it are seemingly disappointed by Milotic.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its dwelling place is the bottom of big lakes. Those who behold its loveliness are said to have their hearts purified.
pokedex_entries.sword: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
pokedex_entries.shield: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It is the world’s most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.

pokedex_entries.ruby: MINUN is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: MINUN loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this POKéMON gives off increasing amounts of sparks.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its dislike of water makes it take shelter under the eaves of houses in rain. It uses pom-poms made of sparks for cheering.
pokedex_entries.emerald: At a meeting of POKéMON academics, it was announced that simultaneous exposure to electricity from a PLUSLE and MINUN will promote circulation and boost vitality.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Exposure to electricity from MINUN and PLUSLE promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
pokedex_entries.x: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.
pokedex_entries.y: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Minun is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this Pokémon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

pokedex_entries.ruby: The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: In water, MUDKIP breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this POKéMON will unleash its amazing power - it can crush rocks bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
pokedex_entries.emerald: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water’s edge.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its power can crush boulders. It rests by covering itself with mud at the bottom of a river.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
pokedex_entries.x: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
pokedex_entries.y: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: The fin on Mudkip’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this Pokémon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Using the fin on its head, Mudkip senses the flow of water to keep track of what’s going on around it. Mudkip has the strength to heft boulders.

pokedex_entries.ruby: NINCADA lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This POKéMON absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: NINCADA lives underground. It uses its sharp claws to carve the roots of trees and absorb moisture and nutrients. This POKéMON can’t withstand bright sunlight so avoids it.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It makes its nest at the roots of a mighty tree. Using its whiskerlike antennae, it probes its surroundings in the pitch-black darkness of soil.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.
pokedex_entries.x: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
pokedex_entries.y: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Nincada lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This Pokémon absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Nincada lives underground. It uses its sharp claws to carve the roots of trees and absorb moisture and nutrients. This Pokémon can’t withstand bright sunlight so avoids it.
pokedex_entries.sword: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
pokedex_entries.shield: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.

pokedex_entries.ruby: NINJASK moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this POKéMON was long believed to be invisible.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: If NINJASK is not trained properly, it will refuse to obey the TRAINER and cry loudly continuously. Because of this quality, this POKéMON is said to be one that puts the TRAINER’s abilities to the test.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: This POKéMON is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Because it darts about vigorously at high speed, it is very difficult to see. Hearing its distinctive cries for too long induces a headache.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
pokedex_entries.x: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
pokedex_entries.y: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Ninjask moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this Pokémon was long believed to be invisible.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: If Ninjask is not trained properly, it will refuse to obey the Trainer and cry loudly continuously. Because of this quality, this Pokémon is said to be one that puts the Trainer’s abilities to the test.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Because they move so quickly, they sometimes become unseeable. They congregate around tree sap.

pokedex_entries.ruby: NOSEPASS’s magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these POKéMON meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: NOSEPASS had been said to be completely unmoving, with its magnetic nose pointed due north. However, close observation has revealed that the POKéMON actually moves by a little over 3/8 of an inch every year.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check NOSEPASS to get their bearings.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its body emits a powerful magnetism. It feeds on prey that is pulled in by the force. Its magnetism is stronger in cold seasons.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: Its nose is a magnet. As a result, this Pokémon always keeps its face pointing north.
pokedex_entries.platinum: When endangered, it may protect itself by raising its magnetism and drawing iron objects to its body.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: If two of these meet, they cannot get too close because their noses repel each other.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: When endangered, it may protect itself by raising its magnetism and drawing iron objects to its body.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
pokedex_entries.x: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
pokedex_entries.y: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Nosepass’s magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these Pokémon meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Nosepass had been said to be completely unmoving, with its magnetic nose pointed due north. However, close observation has revealed that the Pokémon actually moves by a little over 3/8 of an inch every year.
pokedex_entries.sun: The magnet in Nosepass’s nose provides an unerring compass, making it an excellent partner for Trainers going on a journey.
pokedex_entries.moon: It uses powerful magnetism to drag its prey toward it. It’s also been known to pull in metal, which it collects and uses to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it’s in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It hunts without twitching a muscle by pulling in its prey with powerful magnetism. But sometimes it pulls natural enemies in close.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its nose is a magnet. As a result, this Pokémon always keeps its face pointing north.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Once the people of Hisui discovered that its red nose always points north, they grew to rely on it greatly when traveling afar. The nose seems to work in a similar way to ancient compasses.

pokedex_entries.ruby: NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it doesn’t notice being hit. However, it can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: NUMEL stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees F within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens. In that event, the POKéMON’s body grows heavy and its movements become sluggish.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. When it grows cold, the magma hardens and slows it.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A NUMEL stores boiling magma in the hump on its back. It is a hardy POKéMON that can transport a 220-pound load. It has served humans at work since long ago.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: The flaming magma it stores in the hump on its back is the source of its tremendous power.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees F. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
pokedex_entries.x: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
pokedex_entries.y: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Numel is extremely dull witted—it doesn’t notice being hit. However, it can’t stand hunger for even a second. This Pokémon’s body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Numel stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens. In that event, the Pokémon’s body grows heavy and its movements become sluggish.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing Numel down.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. When it grows cold, the magma hardens and slows it.
pokedex_entries.violet: The flaming magma it stores in the hump on its back is the source of its tremendous power.

pokedex_entries.ruby: NUZLEAF live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This POKéMON dislikes having its long nose pinched.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: This POKéMON pulls out the leaf on its head and makes a flute with it. The sound of NUZLEAF’s flute strikes fear and uncertainty in the hearts of people lost in a forest.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of NUZLEAF’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A forest-dwelling POKéMON that is skilled at climbing trees. Its long and pointed nose is its weak point. It loses power if the nose is gripped.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
pokedex_entries.x: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
pokedex_entries.y: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Nuzleaf live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This Pokémon dislikes having its long nose pinched.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon pulls out the leaf on its head and makes a flute with it. The sound of Nuzleaf’s flute strikes fear and uncertainty in the hearts of people lost in a forest.
pokedex_entries.sword: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
pokedex_entries.shield: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleaf’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in the forest.

pokedex_entries.ruby: PELIPPER is a flying transporter that carries small POKéMON and eggs inside its massive bill. This POKéMON builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: PELIPPER searches for food while in flight by skimming the wave tops. This POKéMON dips its large bill in the sea to scoop up food, then swallows everything in one big gulp.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is a flying transporter that carries small POKéMON in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It skims the tops of waves as it flies. When it spots prey, it uses its large beak to scoop up the victim with water. It protects its eggs in its beak.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It acts as a delivery service by carrying small Pokémon in its bill. It bobs on the waves to rest.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It protects its young in its beak. It bobs on waves, resting on them on days when the waters are calm.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Skimming the water’s surface, it dips its large bill in the sea, scoops up food and water, and carries it.
pokedex_entries.x: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
pokedex_entries.y: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Pelipper is a flying transporter that carries small Pokémon and eggs inside its massive bill. This Pokémon builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Pelipper searches for food while in flight by skimming the wave tops. This Pokémon dips its large bill in the sea to scoop up food, then swallows everything in one big gulp.
pokedex_entries.sun: Its spacious beak is large enough for a small child to fit right inside.
pokedex_entries.moon: Gathering food is the work of young males. They store food in their capacious beaks and carry it back to others waiting in the nest.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It places small Pokémon into its spacious beak and carries them around. No one knows where it’s taking them.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It scoops up Wishiwashi in its huge beak and swallows them whole. It can devour more than 30 at one go!
pokedex_entries.sword: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
pokedex_entries.shield: Skimming the water’s surface, it dips its large bill in the sea, scoops up food and water, and carries it.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It acts as a delivery service by carrying small Pokémon in its bill. It bobs on the waves to rest.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It is a flying transporter that carries small Pokémon in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.
pokedex_entries.violet: It protects its young in its beak. It bobs on waves, resting on them on days when the waters are calm.

pokedex_entries.ruby: PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this POKéMON shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: When PLUSLE is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this POKéMON cries loudly.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It cheers on partners while scattering sparks from its body. It climbs telephone poles to absorb electricity.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It has the trait of cheering on its fellow POKéMON. By shorting out the electricity it releases from its paws, it creates pom-poms for cheering.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts out its body to create crackling noises.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
pokedex_entries.x: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
pokedex_entries.y: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts out its body to create crackling noises.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this Pokémon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon cries loudly.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.

pokedex_entries.ruby: At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite at anything that moves. This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: POOCHYENA is an omnivore - it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This POKéMON tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously. It turns tail and runs, however, if the foe strikes back.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It chases its prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it turns tail if the prey strikes back.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
pokedex_entries.x: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
pokedex_entries.y: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: At first sight, Poochyena takes a bite at anything that moves. This Pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishing feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This Pokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its tail bristle out.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

pokedex_entries.ruby: RALTS senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This POKéMON rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: RALTS has the ability to sense the emotions of people. If its TRAINER is in a cheerful mood, this POKéMON grows cheerful and joyous in the same way.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and POKéMON. It hides if it senses hostility.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A RALTS has the power to sense the emotions of people and POKéMON with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: It uses the horns on its head to sense human emotions. It is said to appear in front of cheerful people.
pokedex_entries.platinum: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people’s emotions.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
pokedex_entries.x: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
pokedex_entries.y: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Ralts senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This Pokémon rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Ralts has the ability to sense the emotions of people. If its Trainer is in a cheerful mood, this Pokémon grows cheerful and joyous in the same way.
pokedex_entries.sword: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.
pokedex_entries.shield: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It uses the horns on its head to sense human emotions. It is said to appear in front of cheerful people.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Tends to prefer people with a chipper disposition to those who are gloomy, but it has shown no discrimination with regard to age or gender. Needs more research.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people’s emotions.
pokedex_entries.violet: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

pokedex_entries.ruby: RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth’s ozone layer, never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: RAYQUAZA is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth’s ozone layer, above the clouds. Its existence had been completely unknown because it lived so high in the sky.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It has lived for hundreds of millions of years in the ozone layer. Its flying form looks like a meteor.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that flies endlessly in the ozone layer. It is said it would descend to the ground if KYOGRE and GROUDON were to fight.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
pokedex_entries.x: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
pokedex_entries.y: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

pokedex_entries.ruby: REGICE’s body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can’t be melted, even by fire. This POKéMON controls frigid air of minus 328 degrees F.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: REGICE cloaks itself with frigid air of negative 328 degrees F. Things will freeze solid just by going near this POKéMON. Its icy body is so cold, it will not melt even if it is immersed in magma.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Research revealed that its body is made of the same kind of ice that is found at the South Pole.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its entire body is made of Antarctic ice. After extensive studies, researchers believe the ice was formed during an ice age.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body can’t be melted, even by magma.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.x: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body can’t be melted, even by magma.
pokedex_entries.y: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Regice’s body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can’t be melted, even by fire. This Pokémon controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Regice cloaks itself with frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit. Things will freeze solid just by going near this Pokémon. Its icy body is so cold, it will not melt even if it is immersed in magma.
pokedex_entries.sword: With cold air that can reach temperatures as low as −328 degrees Fahrenheit, Regice instantly freezes any creature that approaches it.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon’s body is made of solid ice. It’s said that Regice was born beneath thick ice in the ice age.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of −328 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_entries.ruby: REGIROCK was sealed away by people long ago. If this POKéMON’s body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: REGIROCK’s body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently, a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all unearthed from different locations.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is entirely composed of rocks with no sign of a brain or heart. It is a mystery even to modern scientists.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that is made entirely of rocks and boulders. If parts of its body chip off in battle, REGIROCK repairs itself by adding new rocks.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
pokedex_entries.x: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
pokedex_entries.y: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Regirock was sealed away by people long ago. If this Pokémon’s body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Regirock’s body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently, a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all unearthed from different locations.
pokedex_entries.sword: Every bit of Regirock’s body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what’s been lost.
pokedex_entries.shield: Cutting-edge technology was used to study the internals of this Pokémon’s rock body, but nothing was found—not even a brain or a heart.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, Regirock attaches rocks to repair itself.

pokedex_entries.ruby: REGISTEEL has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this POKéMON eats.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: REGISTEEL was imprisoned by people in ancient times. The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious substance that is not of this earth.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is sturdier than any kind of metal. It hardened due to pressure underground over tens of thousands of years.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its body is harder than any other kind of metal. The body metal is composed of a mysterious substance. Not only is it hard, it shrinks and stretches flexibly.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its body is said to be harder than any kind of metal. A study has revealed that its body is hollow.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
pokedex_entries.x: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
pokedex_entries.y: Its body is said to be harder than any kind of metal. A study has revealed that its body is hollow.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this Pokémon eats.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Registeel was imprisoned by people in ancient times. The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious substance that is not of this earth.
pokedex_entries.sword: Registeel’s body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.
pokedex_entries.shield: It’s rumored that this Pokémon was born deep underground in the planet’s mantle and that it emerged onto the surface 10,000 years ago.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.

pokedex_entries.ruby: RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: RELICANTH is a rare species that was discovered in deep-sea explorations. This POKéMON’s body withstands the enormous water pressure of the ocean depths. Its body is covered in tough scales that are like craggy rocks.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that was once believed to have been extinct. The species has not changed its form for 100 million years. It walks on the seafloor using its pectoral fins.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Discovered by chance during deep-sea explorations, it has not changed since ancient times.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
pokedex_entries.x: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
pokedex_entries.y: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Relicanth is a Pokémon species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Relicanth is a rare species that was discovered in deep-sea explorations. This Pokémon’s body withstands the enormous water pressure of the ocean depths. Its body is covered in tough scales that are like craggy rocks.
pokedex_entries.sun: Its form has remained the same for one hundred million years. Its body is filled with fat, so it can withstand the water pressure of the deep sea.
pokedex_entries.moon: It was fortuitously discovered during a deep sea expedition. Its teeth have atrophied, so it now survives on microscopic organisms it sucks up.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Thought to have gone extinct, Relicanth was given a name that is a variation of the name of the person who discovered it.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: The reason it hasn’t changed at all in a hundred million years is that it’s apparently already a perfect life-form.
pokedex_entries.sword: Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bladders allow this Pokémon to survive the intense water pressure of the deep sea.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in 100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: This rare Pokémon was discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

pokedex_entries.ruby: ROSELIA shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this POKéMON brings serenity to living things.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: On extremely rare occasions, a ROSELIA is said to appear with its flowers in unusual colors. The thorns on this POKéMON’s head contain a vicious poison.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the ROSELIA is.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A ROSELIA that drinks nutritionally rich springwater blooms with lovely flowers. The fragrance of its flowers has the effect of making its foes careless.
pokedex_entries.diamond: ROSELIA raised on clean drinking water are known to grow vividly colored flowers.
pokedex_entries.pearl: The beautiful flowers on its arms have toxic thorns. Don’t even think about picking those flowers.
pokedex_entries.platinum: The more healthy the ROSELIA, the more pleasant its flowers’ aroma. Its scent deeply relaxes people.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: ROSELIA that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: The more healthy the Roselia, the more pleasant its flowers’ aroma. Its scent deeply relaxes people.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
pokedex_entries.x: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
pokedex_entries.y: Roselia that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Roselia shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this Pokémon brings serenity to living things.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: On extremely rare occasions, a Roselia is said to appear with its flowers in unusual colors. The thorns on this Pokémon’s head contain a vicious poison.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.
pokedex_entries.shield: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: Roselia raised on clean drinking water are known to grow vividly colored flowers.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: The beautiful flowers on its arms have toxic thorns. Don’t even think about picking those flowers.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Though beautiful, it has highly poisonous thorns. There is an old tradition in my homeland wherein one would send these thorns to an opponent to challenge them to a duel.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these POKéMON are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SABLEYE digs the ground with sharpened claws to find rocks that it eats. Substances in the eaten rocks crystallize and rise up to the POKéMON’s body surface.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food--raw gems. A SABLEYE lurks in darkness and is seen only rarely.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
pokedex_entries.x: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
pokedex_entries.y: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Sableye lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these Pokémon are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Sableye digs the ground with sharpened claws to find rocks that it eats. Substances in the eaten rocks crystallize and rise up to the Pokémon’s body surface.
pokedex_entries.sun: It’s a fiend for gemstones, so it stalks Carbink. Unfortunately, Gabite almost always grabs them first.
pokedex_entries.moon: This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine, it’s believed that Sableye will steal people’s spirits away.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It digs through the ground with its hard claws and crunches down gems with its thick pointy teeth. Carbink is its favorite food.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Materials from gems it has eaten float to the surface of its body and can form an infinite number of patterns among individuals.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine, it’s believed that Sableye will steal people’s spirits away.
pokedex_entries.shield: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
pokedex_entries.violet: Materials from gems it has eaten float to the surface of its body and can form an infinite number of patterns among individuals.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SALAMENCE came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: By evolving into SALAMENCE, this POKéMON finally realizes its long-held dream of growing wings. To express its joy, it flies and wheels all over the sky while spouting flames from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
pokedex_entries.emerald: After many long years, its cellular structure underwent a sudden mutation to grow wings. When angered, it loses all thought and rampages out of control.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It’s uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
pokedex_entries.x: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
pokedex_entries.y: It’s uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this Pokémon’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: By evolving into Salamence, this Pokémon finally realizes its long-held dream of growing wings. To express its joy, it flies and wheels all over the sky while spouting flames from its mouth.
pokedex_entries.sun: When angered, it loses all sense of itself and destroys everything around it. The destruction will continue until Salamence has tired itself out.
pokedex_entries.moon: It flies around on its wings, which have grown in at last. In its happiness, it gushes hot flames, burning up the fields it passes over.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Overjoyed at finally being able to fly, it flies all over the place and usually doesn’t land until it’s completely exhausted and needs to sleep.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Thanks to its fervent wishes, the cells in its body finally mutated, and at last it has its heart’s desire—wings.
pokedex_entries.sword: Salamence is an unusual Pokémon in that it was able to evolve a body with wings just by constantly wishing to be able to fly.
pokedex_entries.shield: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It flies around on its wings, which have grown in at last. In its happiness, it gushes hot flames, burning up everything it passes over.
pokedex_entries.violet: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.

pokedex_entries.ruby: The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SCEPTILE has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This POKéMON raises the trees in a forest with loving care.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: The leaves on its forelegs are as sharp as swords. It agilely leaps about the branches of trees to strike.
pokedex_entries.emerald: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This POKéMON carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
pokedex_entries.x: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.
pokedex_entries.y: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: The leaves growing on Sceptile’s body are very sharp edged. This Pokémon is very agile—it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémon raises the trees in a forest with loving care.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SEALEO has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL on its nose.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SEALEO often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the POKéMON is rolling something, it checks the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It touches new things with its nose to test for smell and feel. It plays by spinning SPHEAL on its nose.
pokedex_entries.emerald: SEALEO live in herds on ice floes. Using its powerful flippers, it shatters ice. It dives into the sea to hunt prey five times a day.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.
pokedex_entries.x: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
pokedex_entries.y: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Sealeo has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This Pokémon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a Spheal on its nose.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its nose. While the Pokémon is rolling something, it checks the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes the object or not.
pokedex_entries.sword: Sealeo live on top of drift ice. They go swimming when they’re on the hunt, seeking out their prey by scent.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Poké Balls or Spheal.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Its white whiskers are very sensitive. Sealeo will balance Spheal on the tip of its nose, checking its scent and its feel to be sure the Spheal is healthy.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SEEDOT attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this POKéMON’s body becomes.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SEEDOT looks exactly like an acorn when it is dangling from a tree branch. It startles other POKéMON by suddenly moving. This POKéMON polishes its body once a day using leaves.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: If it remains still, it becomes impossible to distinguish from real nuts. It delights in surprising foraging PIDGEY.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It hangs off branches and absorbs nutrients. When it finishes eating, its body becomes so heavy that it drops to the ground with a thump.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.x: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
pokedex_entries.y: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Seedot attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this Pokémon’s body becomes.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Seedot looks exactly like an acorn when it is dangling from a tree branch. It startles other Pokémon by suddenly moving. This Pokémon polishes its body once a day using leaves.
pokedex_entries.sword: If it remains still, it looks just like a real nut. It delights in surprising foraging Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.shield: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon that try to peck at it.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SEVIPER shares a generations-long feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This POKéMON attacks using its sword-edged tail.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SEVIPER’s swordlike tail serves two purposes - it slashes foes and douses them with secreted poison. This POKéMON will not give up its long-running blood feud with ZANGOOSE.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It sharpens its swordlike tail on hard rocks. It hides in tall grass and strikes unwary prey with venomous fangs.
pokedex_entries.emerald: SEVIPER and ZANGOOSE are eternal rivals. It counters a ZANGOOSE’s dazzling agility with its swordlike tail, which also oozes a horrible poison.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: For many generations, it has feuded with ZANGOOSE. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any ZANGOOSE. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: For many generations, it has feuded with Zangoose. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It’s Zangoose’s archrival.
pokedex_entries.x: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
pokedex_entries.y: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It’s Zangoose’s archrival.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Seviper shares a generations-long feud with Zangoose. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This Pokémon attacks using its sword-edged tail.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Seviper’s swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foes and douses them with secreted poison. This Pokémon will not give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: For many generations, it has feuded with Zangoose. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It sharpens its swordlike tail on hard rocks. It hides in tall grass and strikes unwary prey with venomous fangs.
pokedex_entries.violet: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It’s Zangoose’s archrival.

pokedex_entries.ruby: Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,” SHARPEDO is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these POKéMON can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SHARPEDO can swim at speeds of up to 75 mph by jetting seawater out of its backside. This POKéMON’s drawback is its inability to swim long distances.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: The ruffian of the seas, it has fangs that crunch through iron. It swims by jetting water from its rear.
pokedex_entries.emerald: The vicious and sly gangster of the sea. Its skin is specially textured to minimize drag in water. Its speed tops out at over 75 miles per hour.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
pokedex_entries.x: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”
pokedex_entries.y: It can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,” Sharpedo is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these Pokémon can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Sharpedo can swim at speeds of up to 75 mph by jetting seawater out of its backside. This Pokémon’s drawback is its inability to swim long distances.
pokedex_entries.sun: It pursues its prey at speeds of 75 mph and finishes them off with fangs that can crush iron. It is known as the bully of the sea.
pokedex_entries.moon: It has a sad history. In the past, its dorsal fin was a treasured foodstuff, so this Pokémon became a victim of overfishing.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: People believe that carrying one of its discarded fangs will prevent mishaps at sea, so the fangs are made into accessories.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It drinks in seawater and jets it from its rear to propel itself. It’s very sensitive to the scent of blood.
pokedex_entries.sword: As soon as it catches the scent of prey, Sharpedo will jet seawater from its backside, hurtling toward the target to attack at 75 mph.
pokedex_entries.shield: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sea. Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls home will be attacked—no exceptions.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as the Bully of the Sea.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SHEDINJA’s hard body doesn’t move - not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this POKéMON will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SHEDINJA is a peculiar POKéMON. It seems to appear unsought in a POKé BALL after a NINCADA evolves. This bizarre POKéMON is entirely immobile - it doesn’t even breathe.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: A most peculiar POKéMON that somehow appears in a POKé BALL when a NINCADA evolves.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A peculiar POKéMON that floats in air even though its wings remain completely still. The inside of its body is hollow and utterly dark.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: A strange Pokémon--it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.
pokedex_entries.x: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.
pokedex_entries.y: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Shedinja’s hard body doesn’t move—not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this Pokémon will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Shedinja is a peculiar Pokémon. It seems to appear unsought in a Poké Ball after a Nincada evolves. This bizarre Pokémon is entirely immobile—it doesn’t even breathe.
pokedex_entries.sword: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.
pokedex_entries.shield: A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is a discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.

pokedex_entries.ruby: Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: Covering SHELGON’s body are outgrowths much like bones. The shell is very hard and bounces off enemy attacks. When awaiting evolution, this POKéMON hides away in a cavern.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It hardly eats while it awaits evolution. It becomes hardier by enduring hunger. Its shell peels off the instant it begins to evolve.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It surrounds its body in an iron-hard shell to accumulate enough power to evolve.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
pokedex_entries.x: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
pokedex_entries.y: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Inside Shelgon’s armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This Pokémon’s shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Covering Shelgon’s body are outgrowths much like bones. The shell is very hard and bounces off enemy attacks. When awaiting evolution, this Pokémon hides away in a cavern.
pokedex_entries.sun: The cells within its shell transform with explosive speed, preparing it for evolution.
pokedex_entries.moon: They lurk deep within caves—motionless, neither eating nor drinking. Why they don’t die is not known.
