pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The cells within its body are changing at a bewildering pace. Its hard shell is made from the same substance as bone.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Shelgon lives deep within caves. It stays shut up in its hard shell, dreaming of the day it will be able to fly.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon has covered its body in a hard shell that has the same composition as bone. Shelgon stores energy for evolution.
pokedex_entries.shield: Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once all its energy stores are used up.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant the Pokémon evolves.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: The cells within its shell transform with explosive speed, preparing it for evolution.
pokedex_entries.violet: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SHIFTRY is a mysterious POKéMON that is said to live atop towering trees dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with the fans it holds.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SHIFTRY’s large fans generate awesome gusts of wind at a speed close to 100 feet per second. The whipped-up wind blows anything away. This POKéMON chooses to live quietly deep in forests.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: A POKéMON that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It is said to arrive on chilly, wintry winds. Feared from long ago as the guardian of forests, this POKéMON lives in a deep forest where people do not venture.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.
pokedex_entries.x: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
pokedex_entries.y: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 feet per second that can level houses.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Shiftry is a mysterious Pokémon that is said to live atop towering trees dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with the fans it holds.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Shiftry’s large fans generate awesome gusts of wind at a speed close to 100 feet per second. The whipped-up wind blows anything away. This Pokémon chooses to live quietly deep in forests.
pokedex_entries.sword: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
pokedex_entries.shield: It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: By flapping its leafy fans, it can whip up gusts of 100 feet per second that can level houses.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This POKéMON feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: If SHROOMISH senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This POKéMON’s spores are so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It loves to eat damp, composted soil in forests. If you enter a forest after a long rain, you can see many SHROOMISH feasting on composted soil.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: If it senses danger, it scatters spores from the top of its head to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
pokedex_entries.x: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
pokedex_entries.y: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Shroomish live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This Pokémon feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This Pokémon’s spores are so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over the body if inhaled.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
pokedex_entries.violet: If it senses danger, it scatters spores from the top of its head to protect itself.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SHUPPET is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this POKéMON will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person’s home.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SHUPPET grows by feeding on dark emotions, such as vengefulness and envy, in the hearts of people. It roams through cities in search of grudges that taint people.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.
pokedex_entries.emerald: This POKéMON roams about deep in the night seeking such negative emotions as grudges and envy. It retreats to its nest when the sun begins to rise.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice, or so it’s said. It’s very active at night.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It feeds on the dark emotions of sadness and hatred, which make it grow steadily stronger.
pokedex_entries.x: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice--or so it’s said. It’s very active at night.
pokedex_entries.y: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Shuppet is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this Pokémon will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person’s home.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Shuppet grows by feeding on dark emotions, such as vengefulness and envy, in the hearts of people. It roams through cities in search of grudges that taint people.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It eats up emotions like malice, jealousy, and resentment, so some people are grateful for its presence.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: There’s a proverb that says, “Shun the house where Shuppet gather in the growing dusk.”
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: They love vengeful emotions and hang in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.
pokedex_entries.violet: It feeds on the dark emotions of sadness and hatred, which make it grow steadily stronger.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SILCOON was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought that this POKéMON slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It conserves its energy by moving as little as possible. It awaits evolution while drinking only a little rainwater.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It prepares for evolution using the energy it stored while it was a WURMPLE. It keeps watch over the surroundings with its two eyes.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It anchors itself by wrapping twigs with the silk from its body. It motionlessly awaits evolution.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Having wrapped silk around the branches of a tree, it quiescently awaits evolution.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.x: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
pokedex_entries.y: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this Pokémon hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought that this Pokémon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It anchors itself by wrapping twigs with the silk from its body. It motionlessly awaits evolution.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It drinks dew that collects on its silk while it waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Wraps itself in thin strings of silk while it stores energy for evolution. It can’t extend its limbs and its movement is slow, but its eyes keep a sharp lookout—Silcoon is always on guard.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SKITTY has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SKITTY is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild, this POKéMON lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is said to be difficult to earn its trust. However, it is extremely popular for its cute looks and behavior.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A SKITTY’s adorably cute behavior makes it highly popular. In battle, it makes its tail puff out. It threatens foes with a sharp growl.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It’s adorable when it chases its own tail. It’s difficult to earn its trust.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.
pokedex_entries.x: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
pokedex_entries.y: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Skitty has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This Pokémon is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in circles, chasing its own tail.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SLAKING spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this POKéMON reluctantly moves to another spot.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: Wherever SLAKING live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear in grassy fields. They are made by the POKéMON as it eats all the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is the world’s most slothful POKéMON. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Hordes of SLAKING gather around trees when fruits come into season. They wait around patiently for ripened fruits to fall out of the trees.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: The world’s laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: The world’s laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there’s no food left within its reach.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: The world’s laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: This Pokémon lives lying on its side. It only rolls over and moves when there is no more grass to eat.
pokedex_entries.x: The world’s laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there’s no food left within its reach.
pokedex_entries.y: It is the world’s most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Slaking spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this Pokémon reluctantly moves to another spot.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats all the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It is the world’s laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It is the world’s most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.
pokedex_entries.violet: This Pokémon lives lying on its side. It only rolls over and moves when there is no more grass to eat.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This POKéMON’s sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SLAKOTH’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this POKéMON in motion.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It sleeps virtually all day and night long. It doesn’t change its nest its entire life, but it sometimes travels great distances by swimming in rivers.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: The way SLAKOTH lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: If it eats just three leaves in a day, it is satisfied. Other than that, it sleeps for 20 hours a day.
pokedex_entries.x: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.
pokedex_entries.y: If it eats just three leaves in a day, it is satisfied. Other than that, it sleeps for 20 hours a day.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Slakoth lolls around for over 20 hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This Pokémon’s sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Slakoth’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this Pokémon in motion.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.
pokedex_entries.violet: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SNORUNT survives by eating only snow and ice. Old folklore claims that a house visited by this POKéMON is sure to prosper for many generations to come.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is said that a home visited by a SNORUNT will prosper. It can withstand cold of minus 150 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.emerald: They tend to move about in groups of around five SNORUNT. In snowy regions, it is said that when they are seen late at night, snowfall will arrive by morning.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a SNORUNT lives there.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It is said that several SNORUNT gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It’s said that if they are seen at midnight, they’ll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
pokedex_entries.x: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
pokedex_entries.y: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Snorunt live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this Pokémon steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Snorunt survives by eating only snow and ice. Old folklore claims that a house visited by this Pokémon is sure to prosper for many generations to come.
pokedex_entries.sun: Their numbers seem to have rapidly increased in Alola. Custom has it that houses where Snorunt live will be prosperous for generations to come.
pokedex_entries.moon: It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces happily around, even in environments as cold as -150 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It feeds mainly on ice and snow. It’s only able to survive in a limited number of places in the warm Alola region.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Rich people from cold areas all share childhood memories of playing with Snorunt.
pokedex_entries.sword: It’s said that if they are seen at midnight, they’ll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.
pokedex_entries.shield: It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces happily around, even in environments as cold as −150 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: In some snowy lands, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Arrives alongside the first snow. It’s thought that homes Snorunt visit will prosper for many generations. By tradition, one might offer a lump of ice made from pure water at one’s front door.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
pokedex_entries.violet: It is said that a home visited by a Snorunt will prosper. It can withstand cold of −150 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SOLROCK is a new species of POKéMON that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this POKéMON releases intensely bright light.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: Sunlight is the source of SOLROCK’s power. It is said to possess the ability to read the emotions of others. This POKéMON gives off intense heat while rotating its body.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Solar energy is the source of this POKéMON’s power. On sunny days, groups of SOLROCK line up facing the sun and absorb its light.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
pokedex_entries.x: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
pokedex_entries.y: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Solrock is a new species of Pokémon that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this Pokémon releases intensely bright light.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Sunlight is the source of Solrock’s power. It is said to possess the ability to read the emotions of others. This Pokémon gives off intense heat while rotating its body.
pokedex_entries.sword: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.
pokedex_entries.shield: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: This new Pokémon species is rumored to be an avatar of the sun. The Pokémon gives off light while spinning.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SPHEAL is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SPHEAL always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body. When the season for ice floes arrives, this POKéMON can be seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It is completely covered with plushy fur. As a result, it never feels the cold even when it is rolling about on ice floes or diving in the sea.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It crosses the oceans by rolling itself on drifting ice. Fluffy fur keeps it warm when the temperature is below freezing.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: They can’t swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they’re happy, they clap fins.
pokedex_entries.x: They can’t swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they’re happy, they clap fins.
pokedex_entries.y: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Spheal is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this Pokémon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body. When the season for ice floes arrives, this Pokémon can be seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.
pokedex_entries.sword: This Pokémon’s body is covered in blubber and impressively round. It’s faster for Spheal to roll around than walk.
pokedex_entries.shield: As it drifts among the waves, Spheal probes the sea. As soon as it spots prey, it informs the Walrein in its herd.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: During the season when drift ice approaches the shore, Spheal prefers living on the ice—where fewer predators lurk—rather than the land. Its fur retains heat superbly and resists harsh cold.

pokedex_entries.ruby: All the SPINDA that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this POKéMON give it the appearance of dancing.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: No two SPINDA are said to have identical spot patterns on their hides. This POKéMON moves in a curious manner as if it is stumbling in dizziness. Its lurching movements can cause the opponent to become confused.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: No two SPINDA are said to have identical patterns. It confuses foes with its stumbling motions.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It is distinguished by a pattern of spots that is always different. Its unsteady, tottering walk has the effect of fouling its foe’s aim.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: No two SPINDA have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: The chances of two SPINDA having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
pokedex_entries.x: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
pokedex_entries.y: The chances of two Spinda having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: All the Spinda that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this Pokémon give it the appearance of dancing.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: No two Spinda are said to have identical spot patterns on their hides. This Pokémon moves in a curious manner as if it is stumbling in dizziness. Its lurching movements can cause the opponent to become confused.
pokedex_entries.sun: Its steps are staggering and unsteady, but Spinda thinks it’s walking in a straight line.
pokedex_entries.moon: Each and every Spinda has a slightly different configuration of spots. There are collectors who enjoy the tiny differences in their spot patterns.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Its steps are shaky and stumbling. Walking for a long time makes it feel sick.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Each Spinda’s spot pattern is different. With its stumbling movements, it evades opponents’ attacks brilliantly!
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Their tottering steps hinder the aim of foes.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SPOINK bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this POKéMON cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SPOINK keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to amplify this POKéMON’s psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger pearl.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It apparently dies if it stops bouncing about. It carries a pearl from CLAMPERL on its head.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that manipulates psychic power at will. It doesn’t stop bouncing even when it is asleep. It loves eating mushrooms that grow underground.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from CLAMPERL on its head.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Using its tail like a spring, it keeps its heart beating by bouncing constantly. If it stops, it dies.
pokedex_entries.x: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
pokedex_entries.y: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Spoink bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this Pokémon cannot afford to stop bouncing—if it stops, its heart will stop.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to amplify this Pokémon’s psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger pearl.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Spoink will die if it stops bouncing. The pearl on its head amplifies its psychic powers.
pokedex_entries.violet: Using its tail like a spring, it keeps its heart beating by bouncing constantly. If it stops, it dies.

pokedex_entries.ruby: From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: If SURSKIT senses danger, it secretes a thick, sugary syrup from the tip of its head. There are some POKéMON that love eating this syrup.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
pokedex_entries.emerald: They gather on puddles after evening downpours, gliding across the surface of water as if sliding. It secretes honey with a sweet aroma from its head.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It secretes a thick, sweet-scented syrup from the tip of its head. It lives on weed-choked ponds.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
pokedex_entries.x: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
pokedex_entries.y: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: From the tips of its feet, Surskit secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: If Surskit senses danger, it secretes a thick, sugary syrup from the tip of its head. There are some Pokémon that love eating this syrup.
pokedex_entries.sun: It moves as if skating on the surface of the water. It often fights with Dewpider over food.
pokedex_entries.moon: When this Pokémon senses danger, a sweet fluid oozes from the tip of its head. The taste of it disgusts bird Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: If it’s in a pinch, it will secrete a sweet liquid from the tip of its head. Syrup made from gathering that liquid is tasty on bread.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It lives in ponds and marshes that feature lots of plant life. It often fights with Dewpider, whose habitat and diet are similar.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey in with a sweet scent released from the tip of its head.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
pokedex_entries.violet: It secretes a thick, sweet-scented syrup from the tip of its head. It lives on weed-choked ponds.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SWABLU loves to make things clean. If it spots something dirty, it will wipe and polish it with its cottony wings. If its wings become dirty, this POKéMON finds a stream and showers itself.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A POKéMON that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, SWABLU flocks move closer to towns in the spring.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone’s head, it looks like a cotton hat.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It can’t relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its wings bring cottony clouds to mind. It grooms with springwater and loves to sit on heads.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It can’t relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: For some reason, it likes to land on people’s heads softly and act like it’s a hat.
pokedex_entries.x: For some reason, it likes to land on people’s heads softly and act like it’s a hat.
pokedex_entries.y: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Swablu has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This Pokémon is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Swablu loves to make things clean. If it spots something dirty, it will wipe and polish it with its cottony wings. If its wings become dirty, this Pokémon finds a stream and showers itself.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its cottony wings are full of air, making them light and fluffy to the touch. Swablu takes diligent care of its wings.
pokedex_entries.shield: Since Swablu looks like a cumulus cloud, foes can have a hard time finding it. Apparently its wings turned white over many generations.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone’s head, it looks like a cotton hat.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
pokedex_entries.violet: It can’t relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.

pokedex_entries.ruby: When SWALOT spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this POKéMON gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SWALOT has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this POKéMON’s mouth.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp. It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from the pores on its body.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its powerful stomach acid is capable of digesting almost anything. The one thing in the whole world a SWALOT can’t digest is its own stomach.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
pokedex_entries.x: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
pokedex_entries.y: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: When Swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this Pokémon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.
pokedex_entries.violet: It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp. It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from the pores on its body.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SWAMPERT predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.
pokedex_entries.emerald: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it can break a boulder into pieces.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
pokedex_entries.x: Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it can break a boulder into pieces.
pokedex_entries.y: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

pokedex_entries.ruby: SWELLOW flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This POKéMON dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW’s clawed feet, preventing escape.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: SWELLOW is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two SWELLOW are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other’s wings.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A SWELLOW dives upon prey from far above. It never misses its targets. It takes to the skies in search of lands with a warm climate.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.
pokedex_entries.x: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
pokedex_entries.y: It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by Swellow’s clawed feet, preventing escape.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other’s wings.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It circles the sky in search of prey and dives sharply to catch its target.

pokedex_entries.ruby: TAILLOW courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy POKéMON will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: TAILLOW is young - it has only just left its nest. As a result, it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night. This POKéMON feeds on WURMPLE that live in forests.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Although it is small, it is very courageous. It will take on a larger SKARMORY on an equal footing. However, its will weakens if it becomes hungry.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: When it gets cold, they migrate, flying over 180 miles a day. It hunts for tasty prey.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
pokedex_entries.x: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
pokedex_entries.y: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Taillow courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy Pokémon will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Taillow is young—it has only just left its nest. As a result, it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night. This Pokémon feeds on Wurmple that live in forests.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.

pokedex_entries.ruby: TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER, following behind with unsteady steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees F, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: TORCHIC has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug - it will be glowing with warmth. This POKéMON is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.
pokedex_entries.emerald: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A TORCHIC dislikes darkness because it can’t see its surroundings.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Inside its body is a place where it keeps a small flame. Hug it! It will be as warm as a hot-water bottle.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.
pokedex_entries.x: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.
pokedex_entries.y: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Torchic sticks with its Trainer, following behind with unsteady steps. This Pokémon breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: A fire burns inside it, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokedex_entries.ruby: TORKOAL digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this POKéMON spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: TORKOAL generates energy by burning coal. It grows weaker as the fire dies down. When it is preparing for battle, this POKéMON burns more coal.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It burns coal inside its shell. If it is attacked, it belches thick, black smoke and flees.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It battles using energy it gets from burning coal. When loosing smoke from its nostrils, it lets off a sound that is similar to a locomotive’s horn.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
pokedex_entries.x: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
pokedex_entries.y: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Torkoal digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this Pokémon spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Torkoal generates energy by burning coal. It grows weaker as the fire dies down. When it is preparing for battle, this Pokémon burns more coal.
pokedex_entries.sun: Coal is the source of Torkoal’s energy. Large amounts of coal can be found in the mountains where they live.
pokedex_entries.moon: If the fire burning within its shell goes out, it will die. Those who wish to raise one in their home must always keep something flammable at hand.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: You can tell how it’s feeling by the smoke spouting from its shell. Tremendous velocity is a sign of good health.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It burns coal to produce energy. When it has burned through all of its coal, it becomes unable to move.
pokedex_entries.sword: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
pokedex_entries.shield: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is in a tough situation.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
pokedex_entries.violet: Coal is the source of Torkoal’s energy. Large amounts of coal can be found in the mountains where they live.

pokedex_entries.ruby: TRAPINCH’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This POKéMON patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: TRAPINCH is a patient hunter. It digs an inescapable pit in a desert and waits for its prey to come tumbling down. This POKéMON can go a whole week without access to any water.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its big jaws crunch through boulders. Because its head is so big, it has a hard time getting back upright if it tips over onto its back.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert. Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
pokedex_entries.x: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
pokedex_entries.y: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Trapinch’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This Pokémon patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Trapinch is a patient hunter. It digs an inescapable pit in a desert and waits for its prey to come tumbling down. This Pokémon can go a whole week without access to any water.
pokedex_entries.sun: It can live for a week without eating a thing. It waits patiently at the bottom of its nest for prey to appear.
pokedex_entries.moon: As it digs through the sand, its giant jaws crush any rocks that obstruct its path. It builds a funnel-shaped nest.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Its jaws are strong enough to crush rocks but so heavy that it can’t get up if it flips over. Sandile seize those moments as their chance.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It builds nests that double as traps, lying in wait for its prey to get caught. When night falls, it digs itself a spot beneath the sand to sleep.
pokedex_entries.sword: Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert. Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.
pokedex_entries.shield: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

pokedex_entries.ruby: TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: TREECKO is cool, calm, and collected - it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this POKéMON, it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest’s trees.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.
pokedex_entries.x: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.
pokedex_entries.y: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Treecko has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This Pokémon attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Treecko is cool, calm, and collected—it never panics under any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokémon, it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny hooks, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.

pokedex_entries.ruby: The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s neck are very popular with children. This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of TROPIUS. This POKéMON flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It flies by flapping its broad leaves. The bunch of fruit that grows around its neck is deliciously sweet. In the spring, it scatters pollen from its neck.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearl: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It’s a highly favored tropical snack.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
pokedex_entries.x: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
pokedex_entries.y: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It’s a highly favored tropical snack.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: The bunches of fruit around Tropius’s neck are very popular with children. This Pokémon loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Children of the southern tropics eat as snacks the fruit that grows in bunches around the neck of Tropius. This Pokémon flies by flapping the leaves on its back as if they were wings.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: The bunches of fruit growing around the necks of Tropius in Alola are especially sweet compared to those in other regions.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck. In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Because it continually ate only its favorite fruit, the fruit started growing around its neck.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.
pokedex_entries.violet: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.

pokedex_entries.ruby: To make prey faint, VIBRAVA generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This POKéMON’s ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: VIBRAVA’s wings have not yet completed the process of growing. Rather than flying long distances, they are more useful for generating ultrasonic waves by vibrating.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It looses ultrasonic waves by rubbing its wings together. Since a VIBRAVA’s wings are still in the process of growing, it can only fly short distances.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It vibrates its wings vigorously, creating ultrasonic waves that cause serious headaches.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
pokedex_entries.x: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
pokedex_entries.y: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: To make prey faint, Vibrava generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This Pokémon’s ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Vibrava’s wings have not yet completed the process of growing. Rather than flying long distances, they are more useful for generating ultrasonic waves by vibrating.
pokedex_entries.sun: Rather than using its underdeveloped wings for flight, it rubs them together, producing ultrasonic waves to attack its enemies.
pokedex_entries.moon: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It vibrates its wings to generate ultrasonic waves, causing its prey to faint. Then it buries the prey alive in the sand to preserve it.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It vibrates its wings to send out odd sound waves. Trainers who are with it need earplugs.
pokedex_entries.sword: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
pokedex_entries.shield: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.

pokedex_entries.ruby: VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This POKéMON’s stress level rises if it can’t be moving constantly.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: VIGOROTH is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling this POKéMON to run wild throughout the jungle before it can settle down.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is always hungry because it won’t stop rampaging. Even while it is eating, it can’t keep still.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It can’t keep still because its blood boils with energy. It runs through the fields and mountains all day to calm itself. If it doesn’t, it can’t sleep at night.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Its heartbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it can’t sit still for one second.
pokedex_entries.x: Its heartbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it can’t sit still for one second.
pokedex_entries.y: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Vigoroth is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This Pokémon’s stress level rises if it can’t be moving constantly.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling this Pokémon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can settle down.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Its heart beats at 10 times its previous rate, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.
pokedex_entries.violet: It is always hungry because it won’t stop rampaging. Even while it is eating, it can’t keep still.

pokedex_entries.ruby: With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet aroma of ILLUMISE.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: VOLBEAT’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other VOLBEAT, it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This POKéMON loves the sweet aroma given off by ILLUMISE.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.
pokedex_entries.emerald: With their taillights lit, VOLBEAT fly in a swarm, drawing geometric designs in the night sky. They move their nests if their pond water becomes dirty.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves ILLUMISE’s sweet aroma.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It emits light from its tail to communicate. It loves the sweet aroma given off by ILLUMISE.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
pokedex_entries.x: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.
pokedex_entries.y: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: With the arrival of night, Volbeat emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This Pokémon is attracted by the sweet aroma of Illumise.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat, it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.

pokedex_entries.ruby: WAILMER’s nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful POKéMON loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: WAILMER can store water inside its body to transform itself into a ball for bouncing around on the ground. By filling itself up with more water, this POKéMON can elevate the height of its bounces.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.
pokedex_entries.emerald: While this POKéMON usually lives in the sea, it can survive on land, although not too long. It loses vitality if its body becomes dried out.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes with great force.
pokedex_entries.x: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
pokedex_entries.y: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes with great force.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Wailmer’s nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful Pokémon loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Wailmer can store water inside its body to transform itself into a ball for bouncing around on the ground. By filling itself up with more water, this Pokémon can elevate the height of its bounces.
pokedex_entries.sun: It loves to startle people. It fills itself up with seawater and plays by bouncing around like a ball.
pokedex_entries.moon: It shows off by spraying jets of seawater from the nostrils above its eyes. It eats a solid ton of Wishiwashi every day.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: It swims along with its mouth open and swallows down seawater along with its food. It sprays excess water out of its nostrils.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Due to their memories of when they once lived on land, pods of them will, very rarely, wash up on shore.
pokedex_entries.sword: It shows off by spraying jets of seawater from the nostrils above its eyes. It eats a solid ton of Wishiwashi every day.
pokedex_entries.shield: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nostrils.

pokedex_entries.ruby: WAILORD is the largest of all identified POKéMON up to now. This giant POKéMON swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: When chasing prey, WAILORD herds them by leaping out of the water and making a humongous splash. It is breathtaking to see this POKéMON leaping out of the sea with others in its pod.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It is among the largest of all POKéMON. It herds prey in a pack then swallows the massed prey in one gulp.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It breathes through nostrils that it raises above the sea. By inhaling to its maximum capacity, a WAILORD can dive close to 10,000 feet beneath the waves.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It is the largest of all identified Pokémon. They jump as a pack to herd their prey.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
pokedex_entries.x: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
pokedex_entries.y: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Wailord is the largest of all identified Pokémon up to now. This giant Pokémon swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: When chasing prey, Wailord herds them by leaping out of the water and making a humongous splash. It is breathtaking to see this Pokémon leaping out of the sea with others in its pod.
pokedex_entries.sun: Wailord pursue their prey in pods. With their large mouths, they can swallow entire schools of Wishiwashi whole.
pokedex_entries.moon: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: They eat so many fish Pokémon that when Wailord become too numerous, fishermen have to chase them off.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: When a small Wailmer is attacked by Sharpedo or Dhelmise, its whole pod works together to protect it.
pokedex_entries.sword: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
pokedex_entries.shield: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It’s the biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.

pokedex_entries.ruby: WALREIN’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: WALREIN swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.
pokedex_entries.emerald: To protect its herd, the leader battles anything that invades its territory, even at the cost of its life. Its tusks may snap off in battle.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: Not only does its thick blubber keep it warm, it also protects it from attacks. It shatters ice with its prized tusks.
pokedex_entries.x: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.y: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Walrein’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This Pokémon’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.
pokedex_entries.sword: Walrein form herds of 20 to 30 individuals. When a threat appears, the herd’s leader will protect the group with its life.
pokedex_entries.shield: Walrein’s tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold but also enemy attacks.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Its thick tusks are strong enough to shatter drift ice. They have been known to break, but they will grow back by the next year. The Hisui region is well known for these broken tusks.

pokedex_entries.ruby: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these POKéMON will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: If WHISCASH goes on a wild rampage, it sets off a quake-like tremor with a radius of over three miles. This POKéMON has the ability to predict real earthquakes.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything - if it is alive, WHISCASH will eat it.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Mysteriously, it can foretell earthquakes. In the daytime, it sleeps in mud at the bottom of a pond. When it awakens, it continually feeds throughout the night.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.
pokedex_entries.pearl: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to foretell real quakes.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
pokedex_entries.x: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
pokedex_entries.y: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything--if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Whiscash is extremely territorial. Just one of these Pokémon will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: If Whiscash goes on a wild rampage, it sets off a quake-like tremor with a radius of over three miles. This Pokémon has the ability to predict real earthquakes.
pokedex_entries.sun: A glutton that devours anything that moves, it quietly lurks at the bottom of swamps, lying in wait for prey.
pokedex_entries.moon: Sighting Whiscash leaping from the water is believed to herald an earthquake.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: Whiscash shakes the ground at high intensities to intimidate its opponents. It swallows its prey whole—along with mud from the swamp floor.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: Its vision is not that good. It senses vibrations in the water with its whiskers to determine the location of its prey.
pokedex_entries.sword: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything—if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
pokedex_entries.shield: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It is very territorial. It repels foes by setting off tremors that extend over a three-mile radius.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to foretell real quakes.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Strikes its caudal fin against the swamp bed to shake the ground and startle its prey. It will then swallow the fleeing prey whole. People mistook this behavior as the cause of earthquakes.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
pokedex_entries.violet: Sighting Whiscash leaping from the water is believed to herald an earthquake.

pokedex_entries.ruby: Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: WHISMUR is very timid. If it starts to cry loudly, it becomes startled by its own crying and cries even harder. When it finally stops crying, the POKéMON goes to sleep, all tired out.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It usually murmurs, but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Its cries equal a jet plane in volume. It inhales through its ear canals. Because of this system, it can cry continually without having to catch its breath.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.
pokedex_entries.x: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
pokedex_entries.y: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Normally, Whismur’s voice is very quiet—it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this Pokémon senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Whismur is very timid. If it starts to cry loudly, it becomes startled by its own crying and cries even harder. When it finally stops crying, the Pokémon goes to sleep, all tired out.
pokedex_entries.sword: The cry of a Whismur is over 100 decibels. If you’re close to a Whismur when it lets out a cry, you’ll be stuck with an all-day headache.
pokedex_entries.shield: When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice startles it, making the Pokémon cry even louder. It cries until it’s exhausted, then it falls asleep.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.

pokedex_entries.ruby: WINGULL has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This POKéMON rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: WINGULL rides updrafts rising from the sea by extending its long and narrow wings to glide. This POKéMON’s long beak is useful for catching prey.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It rides upon ocean winds as if it were a glider. In the winter, it hides food around its nest.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It makes its nest on a sheer cliff at the edge of the sea. It has trouble keeping its wings flapping in flight. Instead, it soars on updrafts.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.
pokedex_entries.pearl: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
pokedex_entries.platinum: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It soars on updrafts without flapping its wings. It makes a nest on sheer cliffs at the sea’s edge.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It makes its nest on sheer cliffs. Riding the sea breeze, it glides up into the expansive skies.
pokedex_entries.x: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
pokedex_entries.y: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Wingull has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This Pokémon rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Wingull rides updrafts rising from the sea by extending its long and narrow wings to glide. This Pokémon’s long beak is useful for catching prey.
pokedex_entries.sun: Its hollow bones enhance its lightness. It spreads its wings to the wind and soars away into the sky.
pokedex_entries.moon: Fishermen keep an eye out for Wingull in the sky, because wherever they’re circling, the ocean is sure to be teeming with fish Pokémon.
pokedex_entries.ultra_sun: With its long, thin wings, it catches updrafts and flies like a glider high up into the sky.
pokedex_entries.ultra_moon: It builds nests in cliffs by the sea. It circles the skies above the ocean looking for its favorite food—Wishiwashi.
pokedex_entries.sword: It makes its nest on sheer cliffs. Riding the sea breeze, it glides up into the expansive skies.
pokedex_entries.shield: It soars on updrafts without flapping its wings. It makes a nest on sheer cliffs at the sea’s edge.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.
pokedex_entries.violet: It rides upon ocean winds as if it were a glider. In the winter, it hides food around its nest.

pokedex_entries.ruby: Using the spikes on its rear end, WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
