pokedex_entries.sapphire: WURMPLE is targeted by SWELLOW as prey. This POKéMON will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.
pokedex_entries.emerald: It sticks to tree branches and eats leaves. The thread it spits from its mouth, which becomes gooey when it touches air, slows the movement of its foes.
pokedex_entries.diamond: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a STARLY, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pokedex_entries.pearl: It spits a white silk that turns sticky when it contacts air. It is used to immobilize foes.
pokedex_entries.platinum: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.
pokedex_entries.x: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pokedex_entries.y: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Using the spikes on its rear end, Wurmple peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This Pokémon’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This Pokémon will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison from the spikes.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamond: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
pokedex_entries.shining_pearl: It spits a white silk thread that turns sticky when coming into contact with air. The silk is used to immobilize foes.
pokedex_entries.legends:_arceus: Likes sap and is abundant in the wild. Why it evolves into various different forms is unknown. One cannot tell from a Wurmple’s appearance which form it will take when it evolves.

pokedex_entries.ruby: WYNAUT can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be slapping the ground with its tail.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: WYNAUT gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this POKéMON gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
pokedex_entries.emerald: A WYNAUT loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
pokedex_entries.x: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
pokedex_entries.y: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Wynaut gather on moonlit nights to play by squeezing up against each other. By being squeezed, this Pokémon gains endurance and is trained to dole out powerful counterattacks.
pokedex_entries.sword: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
pokedex_entries.shield: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: They grow strong by pushing up against one another en masse. They love eating sweet fruit.

pokedex_entries.ruby: Memories of battling its arch-rival SEVIPER are etched into every cell of ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: ZANGOOSE usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This POKéMON shares a bitter rivalry with SEVIPER that dates back over generations.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: If it comes across a SEVIPER, its fur bristles and it assumes its battle pose. Its sharp claws are its best weapon.
pokedex_entries.emerald: When it battles, it stands on its hind legs and attacks with its sharply clawed forelegs. Its fur bristles if it encounters any SEVIPER.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It has feuded with SEVIPER for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a SEVIPER nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.
pokedex_entries.blackwhite: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
pokedex_entries.black_2white_2: It’s Seviper’s archrival. To threaten those it encounters, it fans out the claws on its front paws.
pokedex_entries.x: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
pokedex_entries.y: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Memories of battling its archrival Seviper are etched into every cell of Zangoose’s body. This Pokémon adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokémon shares a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its greatest weapons.
pokedex_entries.scarlet: It’s Seviper’s archrival. To threaten those it encounters, it fans out the claws on its front paws.
pokedex_entries.violet: If it comes across a Seviper, its fur bristles and it assumes its battle pose. Its sharp claws are its best weapon.

pokedex_entries.ruby: ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This POKéMON does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.
pokedex_entries.sapphire: The hair on ZIGZAGOON’s back is bristly. It rubs the hard back hair against trees to leave its territorial markings. This POKéMON may play dead to fool foes in battle.
pokedex_entries.fireredleafgreen: A POKéMON with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigs and zags.
pokedex_entries.emerald: Rubbing its nose against the ground, it always wanders about back and forth in search of something. It is distinguished by the zigzag footprints it leaves.
pokedex_entries.diamondpearlplatinum: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
pokedex_entries.heartgoldsoulsilver: It gets interested in everything, which is why it zigs and zags. It is good at finding items.
pokedex_entries.blackwhiteblack_2white_2: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
pokedex_entries.x: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
pokedex_entries.y: A Pokémon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigzags.
pokedex_entries.omega_ruby: Zigzagoon restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This Pokémon does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.
pokedex_entries.alpha_sapphire: The hair on Zigzagoon’s back is bristly. It rubs the hard back hair against trees to leave its territorial markings. This Pokémon may play dead to fool foes in battle.
pokedex_entries.sword: It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and calmer than the kind native to Galar.
pokedex_entries.shield: Zigzagoon that adapted to regions outside Galar acquired this appearance. If you’ve lost something, this Pokémon can likely find it.
pokedex_entries.brilliant_diamondshining_pearl: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
